translation.en: How about a story?
translation.zh: 我给你讲段故事吧？

translation.en: Let's see. Where to begin?
translation.zh: 我们看看啊 从哪里开始呢？

translation.en: Last year, our dairy farm officially opened the Bernet Farm Wine Vineyards.
translation.zh: 我们奶牛场里的贝奈特葡萄园 去年正式开业了

translation.en: Even though we don't have to step on grapes to make wine nowadays,
translation.zh: 尽管我们现在不需要 脚踩葡萄的酿酒技术了

translation.en: I convinced my sister that grapes squishing between your toes makes people happy.
translation.zh: 但我说服我姐姐 葡萄在脚趾间破裂能给人带来快乐

translation.en: It was my mom's favorite.
translation.zh: 那种感觉是我妈妈的最爱

translation.en: I spent most weekends learning everything there is about dairy farming
translation.zh: 大部分周末时间 我都泡在农场里 学习奶牛养殖技术 这样我就能多多帮忙了

translation.en: so I can help out even more around here.
translation.zh: 学习奶牛养殖技术 这样我就能多多帮忙了

translation.en: I had the best teachers.
translation.zh: 我拥有最好的老师们

translation.en: Well, teacher.
translation.zh: 好吧 只有一位老师

translation.en: My sister Callie still runs the place, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 我姐姐凯莉仍然在经营这里

translation.en: And with the extra money from the wine,
translation.zh: 有了酿酒的额外收入

translation.en: we were finally able to hire some extra farmhands.
translation.zh: 我们终于可以雇些帮手了

translation.en: And yet, Callie never stops getting her hands dirty,
translation.zh: 尽管如此 凯莉还是亲力亲为

translation.en: but I've never seen her so happy.
translation.zh: 但我从没见过她这么开心

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Come this way.
translation.zh: 往这边走

translation.en: No dust got in any eyes. Right?
translation.zh: 眼里没进灰尘吧？

translation.en: Manny here is not only our property manager
translation.zh: 曼尼不仅是我们的农场经理

translation.en: but our esteemed vintner and sommelier.
translation.zh: 也是我们尊敬的酿酒师和侍酒师

translation.en: -Now, Manny. -Yes.
translation.zh: -好了 曼尼 -嗯呢

translation.en: Have you tried this bottle yet?
translation.zh: 你试喝过这瓶酒吗？

translation.en: I have never met you. And I have never tried this bottle before.
translation.zh: 我从没见过你们 也没试喝过这瓶酒

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好呢

translation.en: Feast your eyes. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 准备大饱眼福吧

translation.en: -Birch sap. -[Callie] Mm.
translation.zh: 桦树汁

translation.en: Honeysuckle.
translation.zh: 金银花

translation.en: [smacks lips] Chocolat.
translation.zh: 巧克力

translation.en: [smacks lips, sighs] And ground coriander! It's a gift.
translation.zh: -还有香菜碎！ -真是天才

translation.en: -[Manny] No. I've been practicing a lot. -[Callie chuckles]
translation.zh: 没啦 我努力练习来着 是的

translation.en: [girl] But we all know moms makes the best guardian angels.
translation.zh: 但我们都知道 妈妈是最棒的守护天使

translation.en: -I know she's here with us every day. -[cows mooing]
translation.zh: 我知道她每天都跟我们在一起

translation.en: Especially today.
translation.zh: 尤其是今天

translation.en: Hey, Hannah. Are you ready to do this?
translation.zh: 嘿 汉娜 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 准备好了

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -Hey. Are you okay? -[panting] Yeah. I'm fine.
translation.zh: -嘿 你还好吗？ -是的 我很好

translation.en: -Let's practice. -What?
translation.zh: -我们开始练习吧 -什么？

translation.en: [man] I'm gonna get it!
translation.zh: 我去捡！

translation.en: And you guys are here on a very special day
translation.zh: 你们来巧了 今天是一个特别的日子

translation.en: because today we are paying homage
translation.zh: 因为今天我们要致敬

translation.en: to the innovation of historical…
translation.zh: 一项历史性的创新…

translation.en: [chuckles] Of, uh…
translation.zh: 致敬一项…

translation.en: uh… uh, very, uh, historical innovations and--
translation.zh: 极具历史性的创新…

translation.en: While including the new innovations of wine-making
translation.zh: 也包括过去几年引进的

translation.en: introduced over the past few years.
translation.zh: 创新酿酒技术

translation.en: Nailed it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 说得真好

translation.en: [Callie] Speaking of innovations,
translation.zh: 说到创新 你们正在品尝最新产品

translation.en: you guys are trying the newest addition. Would you like to see him try another one?
translation.zh: 说到创新 你们正在品尝最新产品 -想不想看他试喝其他的？ -我不喝了！

translation.en: No! You guys need to stay safe. Okay? Can't be drinking that much.
translation.zh: -想不想看他试喝其他的？ -我不喝了！ 我得保障大家安全 对吧？ 不能喝那么多

translation.en: Uh, well… well, there's a Syrah. I think you should show them how…
translation.zh: 这里有一瓶席拉 我觉得你应该向大家展示一下…

translation.en: -Joseph! -Hey!
translation.zh: -约瑟夫！ -嘿！

translation.en: How's everybody doing today? Good?
translation.zh: 大家今天都好吗？很好吗？

translation.en: Everyone, this is Joseph Van Aston, my boyfriend.
translation.zh: 各位 这位是约瑟夫范阿斯顿 他是我的男朋友

translation.en: Oh. Okay. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: You taking a… a wine break, babe?
translation.zh: 你是在饮酒小憩吗 宝贝？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Yes, yes. Yes, I am.
translation.zh: 是的 是呢

translation.en: H… he loves the wine.
translation.zh: 他很爱这款酒

translation.en: It was exactly one year ago that I stumbled onto this property
translation.zh: 就在一年前 我偶然发现了这处农场

translation.en: and became a ranch hand.
translation.zh: 并成为了一名农场工人

translation.en: And I didn't know it at the time…
translation.zh: 我当时并不知道…

translation.en: …but it was the best thing that ever happened to me.
translation.zh: 但这是我经历过的最美好的事情

translation.en: Callie, I know what life is like without you.
translation.zh: 凯莉 我知道没有你的日子是什么样

translation.en: And I know what life is like with you.
translation.zh: 我也知道 跟你在一起的日子是什么样的

translation.en: And it would be my honor and privilege…
translation.zh: 我将会很荣幸…

translation.en: to spend the rest of this life with you.
translation.zh: 能与你共度余生

translation.en: So, Callie Bernet…
translation.zh: 所以 凯莉贝奈特…

translation.en: -…will you marry me? -[gasps, laughs]
translation.zh: 你愿意嫁给我吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Yes, yes, yes!
translation.zh: 愿意！

translation.en: All right! Yes!
translation.zh: 好棒！真好！

translation.en: Get a room.
translation.zh: 别再秀恩爱了

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to bed. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我要去睡了 -好呢

translation.en: Oh. It means so much to me that you guys up and left the tour for this.
translation.zh: 你们改变行程来这里 对我来说意义重大

translation.en: Congratulations, Cal.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 凯莉

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -是啊

translation.en: Yeah. I, uh… I gotta go too. I… I got a date.
translation.zh: 我也得走了 我还有约

translation.en: With me.
translation.zh: -跟我约 -是吗？

translation.en: Somebody may have downloaded Deep Down Under on the Ocu-VR,
translation.zh: 有人可能已经在虚拟现实游戏机上 下载好《海底深处》了

translation.en: and it may put us in a shark tank in South Africa,
translation.zh: 可能会把我们扔进南非的鲨鱼缸里

translation.en: where it breaks, you swim, you live, you die.
translation.zh: 结果设施坏掉 你要游泳逃命 最后被吃掉

translation.en: You die! Yes! I'm gonna set that up right now.
translation.zh: 被吃掉！太棒了！我现在就要开始

translation.en: Hey. Don't stay out too late. You got a big delivery at sunup.
translation.zh: 别熬太晚 明天清晨还要送很多货物

translation.en: Yes, sir. Ma'am.
translation.zh: 遵命 女士

translation.en: So, you gonna stick around for a few days? No. Just tonight.
translation.zh: -你要在这里住几天吗？ -只住一晚

translation.en: Got the big annual gala coming up, and it's, you know, lots to do.
translation.zh: 一年一度的节日庆典就要开始了 有很多事情要做

translation.en: Gala? That sounds fancy.
translation.zh: 节日庆典？听起来不错呢

translation.en: [inhales deeply] More like overblown and extravagant.
translation.zh: 听着更像是铺张浪费

translation.en: I never heard you complain before.
translation.zh: 我以前没听过你抱怨哦

translation.en: It's not really my thing anymore.
translation.zh: 这事已经不适合我了

translation.en: I'd much rather be here with you.
translation.zh: 我更愿意待在这里 跟你腻在一起

translation.en: -[man] Well, we'd love to have you, sir. -Now. Do it. Both of you.
translation.zh: 但我们很希望你俩能来

translation.en: Uh, we're gonna pass.
translation.zh: 我们会过去的

translation.en: Callie, can I… can I borrow you for a second?
translation.zh: 凯莉 能跟你聊几句吗？

translation.en: I, uh… I need your advice.
translation.zh: 我需要你的建议

translation.en: Uh, yeah, sure. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 当然 我马上回来

translation.en: It's been over a year, sir. The city misses you.
translation.zh: 已经一年多了 先生 城市很想念你

translation.en: Does it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Mm. Well, I do.
translation.zh: -反正我想你了 -小伙伴！

translation.en: Partner! Are you coming or not?
translation.zh: -反正我想你了 -小伙伴！ 你到底来不来？

translation.en: So, what's up, lover boy?
translation.zh: 怎么了 小情人？

translation.en: Okay. Shut it. -We're just friends. -[Callie laughs]
translation.zh: 好了 打住吧 我们只是朋友

translation.en: Look, she needed a tour manager.
translation.zh: 听着 她需要导游

translation.en: I needed a change of scenery. You know the deal.
translation.zh: 我需要换换环境 各取所需

translation.en: Hmm. Friends don't travel the country together in a tiny trailer.
translation.zh: 普通朋友是不会共乘一辆拖车 同游全国的

translation.en: [woman] Polaroid time!
translation.zh: 拍立得时间！

translation.en: Here. Let me take it.
translation.zh: 给我吧 我来拍

translation.en: -[woman] The ring. -Okay.
translation.zh: -露出戒指 -好的

translation.en: -[electronic music playing] -[Manny] All right. All right. Straight to the kneecaps! Straight to the kneecaps!
translation.zh: 好的 我们到了 直接打膝盖！

translation.en: -Oh. Whoa, whoa. -Shark! Shark! Let me out! Let me out!
translation.zh: 有鲨鱼！快游！放我出去！

translation.en: Get your character off my ear, Leo!
translation.zh: 让你的角色放开我的耳朵 利奥！

translation.en: [Leo] Get off!
translation.zh: （武器-目标）

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes! -Yes! -Yes! Yes!
translation.zh: -漂亮！ -漂亮！

translation.en: That must have been amazing.
translation.zh: 一定很棒吧

translation.en: Oh my gosh. I'm so sorry. What did you wanna talk to me about?
translation.zh: 天啊 抱歉 你想跟我说什么来着？

translation.en: It doesn't matter. -[woman] Mm-hmm. -We gotta go.
translation.zh: 不重要了 我们得走了

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye, Cal.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见 凯莉

translation.en: Uh, go check on Joseph. Upstairs.
translation.zh: 去楼上看看约瑟夫吧

translation.en: -[woman] Hmm. -What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -玩得开心！

translation.en: [Callie] Coffee's up.
translation.zh: 咖啡好了

translation.en: -[cows mooing] -[Manny] Oh. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [sighs] I've been waiting for this all morning.
translation.zh: 我等了一上午了

translation.en: -[chuckles] -That was supposed to be mine.
translation.zh: 那杯应该是我的

translation.en: Mm-mm. I got some good news.
translation.zh: 那杯应该是我的 我有一个好消息

translation.en: Sick order this a.m.
translation.zh: 今天早晨有一笔超大订单

translation.en: We got 30 cases of the Cabernet Blend,
translation.zh: 我们卖出了30箱赤霞珠混酿

translation.en: 30 cases of the Syrah, and 25 cases of the Noir.
translation.zh: 30箱席拉和25箱黑比诺

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -I wonder who the buyer is. -[cows mooing]
translation.zh: 我很好奇买家是谁

translation.en: Van Aston Enterprises?
translation.zh: 范阿斯顿集团

translation.en: F… for their holiday gala.
translation.zh: 给他们的节日庆典准备的

translation.en: The overblown extravaganza?
translation.zh: 铺张浪费的庆典吗？

translation.en: Yes, but it could be great marketing for the winery.
translation.zh: 是的 但对酿酒厂来说 是个推广的好机会

translation.en: Last year we had 50 cases of Jensen's going for $21 a pour.
translation.zh: 去年我们买了50箱杰森琴酒 每瓶21美元

translation.en: Joseph, this is amazing. -That's my boy, right there! -[all chuckling]
translation.zh: -约瑟夫 太棒了 -小兄弟 好样的！

translation.en: Don't come any closer. -You know what? Don't touch me, dude. -[Leo breathing heavily]
translation.zh: 别再靠近了 不要… 你知道吗？不要碰到我 老兄

translation.en: Sore loser. My K/D ratio is higher than yours.
translation.zh: -输不起呢 -我的击杀/死亡率比你高

translation.en: Whatever. Joseph, can I speak to you for a second, please?
translation.zh: 随便吧 约瑟夫 我能跟你谈谈吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
translation.zh: 好的 当然

translation.en: I thought you were headed back. [sighs] I overslept.
translation.zh: -我以为你回去了 -我睡过头了

translation.en: -There's something I need you to know. -What?
translation.zh: -我有事要告诉你 -怎么了？

translation.en: Remember that wellness retreat your mother took the C-suites to back in October?
translation.zh: 还记得十月份 你妈妈带着管理层去疗养吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. They went to some island to shove wheatgrass up--
translation.zh: 记得 他们跑到一个小岛上收麦草…

translation.en: Spare me the details.
translation.zh: 不用跟我说细节

translation.en: There's, uh… there's a way to say this. Um…
translation.zh: 我来想想怎么说啊

translation.en: She's Downward Dogging with the sexy sutra kata Shavasana man
translation.zh: 她在跟一个性感瑜伽大师 练习下犬式伸展呢

translation.en: in Tahiti, and she's not coming back.
translation.zh: 是去大溪地了 而且不会回来了

translation.en: Long story short, she ran away with her yoga instructor.
translation.zh: 简单来说 她和瑜伽教练私奔了

translation.en: And she's left the company in your name. What? Why am I just now hearing about this?
translation.zh: -她把公司转到你的名下了 -什么？为什么我现在才听说这事？

translation.en: [Leo] Because I didn't wanna spoil yesterday with the news.
translation.zh: 因为我不想让这件事毁掉昨天的求婚

translation.en: [exhales] But don't worry. Victoria is there. She's trying--
translation.zh: 但是别担心 有维多利亚呢 她在努力…

translation.en: Please tell me they didn't leave Victoria in charge.
translation.zh: 别告诉我 他们让维多利亚负责公司事务了

translation.en: -The board voted her in as temporary CEO. -[Joseph] Ugh.
translation.zh: 董事会选举她为临时首席执行官了

translation.en: -She's got them wrapped around her finger. -She doesn't care about the company.
translation.zh: -她把他们都搞定了呢 -她根本不在乎公司

translation.en: She was your mom's right hand.
translation.zh: 她是你妈妈的得力助手

translation.en: But things are falling apart.
translation.zh: 但事情正在变糟

translation.en: The suppliers are dropping like flies.
translation.zh: 供应商正在锐减

translation.en: I know you needed a break. And I… and I appreciate that for you and Callie.
translation.zh: 我知道你需要休息 我很理解你和凯莉

translation.en: But this is your father's company we're talking about.
translation.zh: 但这是你父亲的公司

translation.en: He's gotta be rolling in his grave right now.
translation.zh: 他现在在坟墓里肯定都被气活了

translation.en: Why would my mother just leave everything behind?
translation.zh: 我妈妈为什么要抛下一切？

translation.en: Because of you and Callie.
translation.zh: 因为你和凯莉

translation.en: Your love.
translation.zh: 你们的爱情

translation.en: It inspired her to find one of her own.
translation.zh: 激发她去寻找自己的爱情了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'll go.
translation.zh: 我会回去

translation.en: Do a little damage control but only for a little while.
translation.zh: 控制公司的损失 但只待一段时间

translation.en: -I guess I owe my mother a call. -Uh, don't bother.
translation.zh: -看来我得给我妈妈打电话了 -不用了

translation.en: Cell service is nonexistent on the island.
translation.zh: 岛上没有手机信号

translation.en: Yeah. Take a break. I'll fill you in.
translation.zh: 好了 休息一下吧 有消息我会通知你的

translation.en: [Manny] So pump number seven is out again. I've tried and tried to fix it but--
translation.zh: 七号泵又出故障了 我尝试维修了 但是…

translation.en: Okay. Call the manufacturer and tell them to send us a new one.
translation.zh: 好的 打电话给制造商 让他们换新吧

translation.en: You want to replace the valve. I'll check if the supply levels are even.
translation.zh: 我们想要更换阀门 我去看看供应量是否稳定

translation.en: -Okay. Thank you. -[Manny] Yep.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: -[laughs] -Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [woman] Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊不惊喜！

translation.en: -Oh my God! Oh my God! -[woman squeals] Oh my God!
translation.zh: -天啊！ -天啊！

translation.en: I'm so bummed I missed your proposal last night. I had to pass my anatomy final.
translation.zh: 错过你的求婚了 我好郁闷啊 我解剖学的期末考试必须得过

translation.en: It's fine. You weren't supposed to be here for a few days.
translation.zh: 没关系啦 你不是要过几天才能来嘛

translation.en: I know. I just couldn't wait.
translation.zh: 我知道 我等不及了

translation.en: Well, where is he? -Oh. -I can't wait to meet him!
translation.zh: 他在哪里？我等不及要见他了！

translation.en: All right, the supply levels are even.
translation.zh: 没问题 供应量很稳定

translation.en: -[woman] Congratulations! -What?
translation.zh: -恭喜你！ -什么？

translation.en: I'm Brandy. Best friend, maid of honor, etcetera,
translation.zh: 我是布兰迪 凯莉的闺蜜 婚礼的伴娘

translation.en: and now we're gonna be best friends too, of course.
translation.zh: 当然我们现在也是闺蜜了

translation.en: -Okay! [laughs] -[Brandy screams]
translation.zh: 好呢！

translation.en: [chuckles] Get in here.
translation.zh: -一起抱 -好好

translation.en: -Okay. -Best day of my life.
translation.zh: -一起抱 -好好 -美好的一天 -我好激动！

translation.en: -[Brandy] I'm so excited! -[all laughing]
translation.zh: -美好的一天 -我好激动！

translation.en: -Hey. What did I miss? -I love this!
translation.zh: -嘿 我错过什么了吗？ -我喜欢这样！

translation.en: Uh, Brandy, this is Joseph, my fiancé.
translation.zh: 布兰迪 这是约瑟夫 我的未婚夫

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey. Yay.
translation.zh: 嘿 耶

translation.en: -What's going on? -[clears throat]
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: And this is Manny, our property manager.
translation.zh: 这位是曼尼 我们的农场经理

translation.en: -And your new best friend. -You are actually coworkers now.
translation.zh: -也是你的新闺蜜 -现在你们是同事了

translation.en: -Coworkers? -Yes.
translation.zh: -同事？ -是的

translation.en: Brandy is studying to be an on-field livestock veterinarian
translation.zh: 布兰迪正在学习 成为一名野外牲畜兽医

translation.en: and needs a few extra credits for her internship.
translation.zh: 她需要进行实习 获得额外的学分

translation.en: [smacks lips] So I'm gonna be moving in for a few months!
translation.zh: 所以我要搬过来住几个月！

translation.en: -Yay! -[laughing]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Fiesta! Fiesta! Fiesta! Fiesta!
translation.zh: 派对 派对！

translation.en: -Yay! -Hey!
So, tell me about this gala that cleared out our entire winter stash. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 跟我说说这场 把我们冬季存货都买走的节日庆典吧

translation.en: Well, technically, it is
translation.zh: 严格来说

translation.en: the Van Aston Enterprises City Holiday Alliance Gala.
translation.zh: 这是范阿斯顿集团城市节日联合庆典

translation.en: That's a mouthful.
translation.zh: 真拗口啊

translation.en: We woo our shareholders and potential investors
translation.zh: 我们用精致的装饰和丰盛的大餐

translation.en: with elaborate decorations and a fancy meal,
translation.zh: 来吸引股东和潜在投资者

translation.en: and then all the suppliers show up
translation.zh: 所有供应商也都会来

translation.en: and schmooze with them and the board of direct--
translation.zh: 跟他们和董事会友好闲聊…

translation.en: It… it's very fascinating stuff.
translation.zh: 很有意思

translation.en: -Cal. -Hmm?
translation.zh: 凯莉

translation.en: You know I… I love you, right? And our life here.
translation.zh: 你知道我爱你 对吧？ 也爱我们在这里的生活

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I gotta go to the city for a while.
translation.zh: 我得去城里一阵子

translation.en: -How long? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -多久？ -我不知道

translation.en: But I was hoping that you could come with me to San Francisco.
translation.zh: 但我希望 你能跟我一起去旧金山

translation.en: We can finally have some time to ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们终于可以有自己的时间了

translation.en: Celebrate.
translation.zh: 庆祝一下

translation.en: Plan the wedding.
translation.zh: 计划婚礼

translation.en: There's a reason we haven't had a day off all year long, Joseph.
translation.zh: 约瑟夫 我们整年都没有休息 是有原因的

translation.en: Oh, we're running this place on autopilot.
translation.zh: 经营这里不需要我们亲力亲为了

translation.en: And I've been… I've been wanting to take you to San Francisco for a while now.
translation.zh: 我也一直想带你去旧金山

translation.en: [smacks lips] We can hire extra help.
translation.zh: 我们可以雇人帮忙

translation.en: Manny can manage the farm and the winery. And… and Brandy, she can keep an eye on Hannah.
translation.zh: 曼尼可以管理奶牛场和酿酒厂 布兰迪可以照顾汉娜

translation.en: You've got this thing all planned out, don't you?
translation.zh: 你全都计划好了 是吗？

translation.en: And now I feel guilt coming in from all sides.
translation.zh: 现在我的内疚感从四面八方涌来

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: I guess part of me kept him so busy around here
translation.zh: 我想部分原因是 我让他忙得团团转

translation.en: so we wouldn't have time to go visit the city.
translation.zh: 我们就没时间去城里了

translation.en: Cal.
translation.zh: 凯莉

translation.en: I'm worried we'll get there, he'll miss his old life.
translation.zh: 我担心我们到那里以后 他会怀念以前的生活

translation.en: I don't know. I just… I don't want anything to change.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是…不想改变任何事情

translation.en: Cal, you're getting married. Okay? Change is inevitable.
translation.zh: 凯莉 你要结婚了 改变是必然的

translation.en: And who knows? Maybe you'll fall in love with his world
translation.zh: 也许你会爱上他的世界

translation.en: the way that he fell in love with yours.
translation.zh: 就像他爱上你的世界一样

translation.en: You deserve this.
translation.zh: 这是你应得的

translation.en: It's okay to let a little light in.
translation.zh: 放点光进来也没关系

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: What would your mom say?
translation.zh: 你妈妈会怎么说？

translation.en: I can feel her here, you know.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到她在这里 你懂的

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: [Callie] Hannah, what time do you catch the bus this morning?
translation.zh: 汉娜 你早上几点的校车？

translation.en: -7:50. -So, right now! Wait.
translation.zh: -7:50 -到点了！等一下

translation.en: Come here. I'm gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 过来抱抱 我会想你的

translation.en: You listen to Manny and Brandy when I'm gone, okay?
translation.zh: 我不在的时候 你要听曼尼和布兰迪的话 好吗？

translation.en: And do all your schoolwork without them having to ask.
translation.zh: 别用他们过问 按时完成家庭作业

translation.en: Schoolwork? It's the last day before Christmas break.
translation.zh: 家庭作业？ 今天是圣诞假期前的最后一天

translation.en: -Already? -Good. I'll need an extra set of hands.
translation.zh: -这么快吗？ -太好了 我正好需要一个帮手

translation.en: [gasps] Oh. The veterinarian comes three days a week for health management on the farm.
translation.zh: 兽医每周来三天 负责农场的健康管理

translation.en: Manny, you're on your own those days so Brandy can chat with the vet.
translation.zh: 曼尼 那几天就靠你了 -布兰迪就可以跟兽医交流经验了 -没问题

translation.en: -[Manny] No problem. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -布兰迪就可以跟兽医交流经验了 -没问题

translation.en: If you need an extra hand or two,
translation.zh: 如果你需要帮手 德鲁农场的工人有时间

translation.en: the ranch hands on the Drew farm are looking for some extra days.
translation.zh: 如果你需要帮手 德鲁农场的工人有时间 可以打给他们

translation.en: -There are the numbers to call. -Got it.
translation.zh: -这是电话号码 -知道了

translation.en: And remember, on Sunday after 3:00 p.m…
translation.zh: 还有记住了 周日下午三点以后

translation.en: [both] …it's "buy a bottle, take a bottle with your tour ticket."
translation.zh: 可以“凭观光票 买一瓶 赠一瓶”

translation.en: -I got it, Callie. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我知道了 凯莉 -好吧 -好了 我们的飞机就要到了！

translation.en: [Joseph] All right. Our ride is almost here!
translation.zh: -好吧 -好了 我们的飞机就要到了！

translation.en: Ugh. Hang on a second. Um, I--
translation.zh: 等一下 我…

translation.en: -We've got this. Go! -Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: -我们可以的 去吧！ -好吧

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: My clothes look great on you.
translation.zh: 你穿我的衣服还挺好看

translation.en: Okay. We really gotta go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们真得走了

translation.en: -[Manny] All right. See you later. -Have fun.
translation.zh: -好吧 回头见 -你们玩得开心

translation.en: [Manny] Don't you worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: Old Manny and Brandy. We got this.
translation.zh: 老曼尼和布兰迪 我们可以的

translation.en: That's inappropriate. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 这样不太合适 不好意思

translation.en: Oh my God! What?
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: So what is all this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Those are the most updated reports
translation.zh: 这些是范阿斯顿集团

translation.en: on all suppliers and divisions of Van Aston Enterprises.
translation.zh: 所有供应商和部门的最新报告

translation.en: Enjoy.
translation.zh: 好好看看吧

translation.en: -[breathes deeply] -And so it begins.
translation.zh: 这就开始了

translation.en: Hey, Johnny.
translation.zh: 嘿 约翰尼

translation.en: -It's Rogelio. -It's Rogelio. I knew that.
translation.zh: -我是罗杰利奥 -你是罗杰利奥 我知道的

translation.en: I knew that.
translation.zh: 我知道的

translation.en: [Manny] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Hot enough for you?
translation.zh: 天气够热吧？

translation.en: It's me. Uh… [exhales]
translation.zh: 在我看来…

translation.en: I think we're off to a great start.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们的开局很不错

translation.en: Uh, you know, just both of us handling the ranch.
translation.zh: -哪里不错了？ -你看啊 我俩一起经营农场

translation.en: It's been two hours.
translation.zh: 才刚两小时

translation.en: Two hours? It's been a really great two hours.
translation.zh: 两小时了吗？美好的两小时啊

translation.en: -Can I help you with something? -Can I help you with something? No, um…
translation.zh: -有什么我能帮你的吗？ -你帮我？没有…

translation.en: [smacks lips] No. I got my, uh, lane handled here. So, uh, can I help you with… with something?
translation.zh: 我的工作搞定了 所以我能帮你做什么吗？

translation.en: Nope. Got my lane handled right here.
translation.zh: 没有 我的工作也搞定了

translation.en: Well, if you need anything, uh, I'll just come back around here and check up on you.
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你有什么需要 我会过来帮你的

translation.en: -Okay, then. -Okay, then.
translation.zh: -那好吧 -那好吧

translation.en: -I'll talk to you later, partner. -Bye.
translation.zh: -过会再聊 搭档 -再见

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好呢 -好呢

translation.en: Right this way. Don't worry about your bags.
translation.zh: 请走这边 不用担心你们的行李 会送到房间的

translation.en: I'll have them waiting for you in your room.
translation.zh: 不用担心你们的行李 会送到房间的

translation.en: Don't mind if I do.
translation.zh: 那我就不客气了

translation.en: -[Joseph] Derrica. -Hi, guys. Welcome.
translation.zh: -迪瑞卡 -嗨 欢迎你们回来

translation.en: -Hi. -How are you?
translation.zh: -嗨 -你好吗？

translation.en: Great. Espresso?
translation.zh: 很好 来杯意式浓缩吗？

translation.en: -Oh. Thank you. -Is everything ready for tonight?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -今晚的事都准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. And, uh, congratulations.
translation.zh: 是的 先生 恭喜你啊

translation.en: Thank you. What is happening tonight?
translation.zh: 谢谢 今晚有什么活动呀？

translation.en: -Well… -[Callie] Mm. Hot. [winces]
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: -Oh. Uh, I got it. -[Derrica] I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -抱歉 -我来擦吧

translation.en: [Derrica] It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: -[Callie] I'm sorry. -[Derrica] Let me help you. No, no.
translation.zh: -对不起 -我来帮你 没事的

translation.en: [Callie] Sorry.
translation.zh: 真是抱歉

translation.en: -Joey! -[women squealing]
translation.zh: 约瑟夫！ -天啊！ -走到哪里我都认得你的大屁屁！

translation.en: [woman] I recognize those cheeks anywhere!
translation.zh: -天啊！ -走到哪里我都认得你的大屁屁！

translation.en: -Hi! -[women] Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: -Where have you been? -Yeah. We miss you, Jay.
translation.zh: -你跑哪里去了？ -我们想死你了 约瑟夫

translation.en: Oh. You look good. Here. Joseph Van Aston, in the flesh.
translation.zh: -你好帅呢 -看这里 约瑟夫范阿斯顿 本尊在此

translation.en: -[women chuckle] -It's cute.
translation.zh: 太可爱了

translation.en: Uh, well… [inhales] Callie, this is… this is Tiffany.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是凯莉 这是蒂凡妮

translation.en: -Gina and… and… and Lily. -Gina.
translation.zh: -这是吉娜和莉莉 -吉娜

translation.en: We… we were friends back in the day.
translation.zh: 都是我以前的朋友

translation.en: Friends? That's what you're calling it.
translation.zh: 朋友？你说我们是朋友关系

translation.en: Yeah. We, uh… we really missed our friendship, Joey.
translation.zh: 是啊 好怀念我们的友谊啊 约瑟夫

translation.en: Maybe we can all be friends.
translation.zh: 也许我们都能成为朋友关系哈

translation.en: -[Gina gasps] Yeah. I like that. -[Tiffany] That's bad, right?
translation.zh: -是啊 我喜欢呢 -那太糟了 是吧？

translation.en: Oh my God! -Whoa. No! -What is that?
translation.zh: -天啊！这是什么？ -不是吧！

translation.en: -[Tiffany] I didn't think I'd see the day. -That is amazing. Is it real?
translation.zh: -我从没想过会有这么一天 -太神奇了 是真的吗？

translation.en: -You kind of look like me. -It's so pretty.
translation.zh: -其实你跟我长得挺像 -你真漂亮

translation.en: -It's almost like we're-- -[woman] Joseph.
translation.zh: -简直就像是我们… -约瑟夫

translation.en: [Tiffany] I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 回头见吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -Call me.
translation.zh: -好的 -打给我啊

translation.en: Bye, sweetheart. You're so cute.
translation.zh: 再见 亲爱的 你真可爱

translation.en: Good to see you, darling.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 亲爱的

translation.en: Victoria.
translation.zh: 维多利亚

translation.en: No scruff?
translation.zh: 没有胡渣啦？

translation.en: Cute.
translation.zh: 真可爱

translation.en: And you must be the future Mrs. Van Aston.
translation.zh: 你一定是未来的范阿斯顿夫人吧

translation.en: -Callie. -Oh, honey, I know who you are.
translation.zh: -我叫凯莉 -亲爱的 我知道你是谁

translation.en: I've heard so much about you.
translation.zh: 久仰大名啦

translation.en: Nice to meet you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: God, you're gorgeous. She's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 天啊 你真漂亮 她太漂亮了 跟我说说 你感觉如何？

translation.en: Tell me. How are you feeling?
translation.zh: 她太漂亮了 跟我说说 你感觉如何？

translation.en: Snagging the Roosevelt Room for a wedding venue's unheard of nowadays.
translation.zh: 把罗斯福厅作为婚礼场地 真是前所未闻啊

translation.en: You must be floating.
translation.zh: 你一定高兴上天了吧

translation.en: [inhales] Think of me as an older sis, if you will.
translation.zh: 你可以把我当成姐姐

translation.en: Text me if you need anything at all while you're here. Okay?
translation.zh: 如果在这里有什么需要 发短信给我 好吗？

translation.en: Have fun tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚玩得开心哈

translation.en: We have a lot of business to cover, Jay.
translation.zh: 我们还有很多业务要谈 约瑟夫

translation.en: [Joseph] Here we are.
translation.zh: 我们到了

translation.en: [Callie] Any more surprises? [Joseph] Maybe just one or two.
translation.zh: -还有更多惊喜吗？ -可能还有一两个吧

translation.en: [Joseph] This suite means a lot to the city.
translation.zh: 这间套房对这座城市来说意义重大

translation.en: The history here is pretty amazing.
translation.zh: 这里的历史非常惊人

translation.en: Actually, a lot of presidents have stayed here.
translation.zh: 有几位总统在这里住过

translation.en: Now, this is what I've been dying to show you.
translation.zh: 下面是我一直想带你看的

translation.en: Welcome to San Francisco.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到旧金山

translation.en: Callie, I'm sorry that I didn't tell you about-- The wedding venue?
translation.zh: -凯莉 对不起我没告诉你… -婚礼场地的事？

translation.en: It's just on hold. Okay?
translation.zh: 只是预留了 好吗？

translation.en: Since when?
translation.zh: 什么时候的事？

translation.en: My mom booked it when I told her I was gonna propose.
translation.zh: 我跟我妈说我要求婚时 她就预订了

translation.en: A wedding gift of sorts. But it's not such a terrible idea.
translation.zh: 当做是结婚礼物了 但这也不是什么馊主意啊

translation.en: The venue is beautiful. It's just downstairs.
translation.zh: 场地很漂亮 位置就在楼下

translation.en: What's the date?
translation.zh: 婚礼日期呢？

translation.en: Joseph.
translation.zh: 约瑟夫

translation.en: Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 平安夜

translation.en: Christmas Eve this year?
translation.zh: 今年的平安夜吗？

translation.en: I… I know. I know. It… it sounds crazy, but hear me out.
translation.zh: 我知道这很疯狂 但听我把话说完嘛

translation.en: Petaluma is just an hour away. So your friends and family can come in the evening.
translation.zh: 距离佩塔卢马只有一小时的路程 你的朋友和家人可以晚上过来

translation.en: We have hotel rooms blocked off. The whole nine.
translation.zh: 我们包下了整间酒店

translation.en: All we have to do is show up. And it's Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 咱俩只要现身就行 而且是平安夜呀

translation.en: You know, I can't think of a better Christmas gift
translation.zh: 我想不出更好的圣诞礼物了

translation.en: than waking up next to you knowing that you're my wife.
translation.zh: 娶你为妻 伴我醒来 就是最好的礼物

translation.en: I will think about it. Yes!
translation.zh: -我会考虑的 -太好了！

translation.en: That's all I'm asking.
translation.zh: 这是我唯一的请求

translation.en: Also, I have a few friends that wanna meet you,
translation.zh: 以及我有几个朋友想见见你

translation.en: so I was thinking about taking you out tonight.
translation.zh: 所以我今晚想带你出去

translation.en: Show you off a little bit.
translation.zh: 向他们炫耀一下

translation.en: This place is wild.
translation.zh: 这地方太不可思议了

translation.en: So, where is it we're going tonight?
translation.zh: 所以我们今晚要去哪里？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Well, first, we need to get you out of this
translation.zh: 首先 我们得把你的这身衣服

translation.en: and into that.
translation.zh: 换成这件

translation.en: -[Callie] How did you-- -[Joseph] You can thank Victoria.
translation.zh: -你怎么… -这要感谢维多利亚

translation.en: [Callie] Oh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: All right. You're gonna want to go in all the way to the shoulder.
translation.zh: 好了 你要一路摸到肩膀

translation.en: -Yeah. All the way. All-- There you go. -[cow mooing]
translation.zh: 对的 一直往前 就是这样

translation.en: You're okay. You're okay.
translation.zh: 你没事的

translation.en: Good, good. Now, you should feel the fetus.
translation.zh: 很好 现在你应该摸到胎儿了

translation.en: You should feel a head or some legs.
translation.zh: 你应该摸到头或者腿了

translation.en: [Manny clears throat] Brandy.
translation.zh: 布兰迪

translation.en: …I was thinking since it's almost dinnertime, you know, I can, uh,
translation.zh: 我在想 既然快到晚餐时间了 我可以去熟食店外带 或者我们可以在外面吃

translation.en: go down to the deli and, uh, you know, we can maybe eat outside.
translation.zh: 我可以去熟食店外带 或者我们可以在外面吃

translation.en: Yeah. I'll take a sloppy joe.
translation.zh: 好啊 我要一个肉酱汉堡

translation.en: Sloppy joe? That's what you want? Out of everything you want a-- [retches]
translation.zh: 肉酱汉堡 你就只要一个汉堡…

translation.en: -With extra ranch, please. -Good. Extra ran-- [retches]
translation.zh: -多加酱料 谢谢 -多加酱料

translation.en: Okay. All right. You got it. Extra ranch.
translation.zh: 好的 好呢 没问题 多加酱料

translation.en: Is he gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 他还好吧？

translation.en: Probably not.
translation.zh: 可能不太好了

translation.en: Aren't ranch hands supposed to not be grossed out by stuff like that?
translation.zh: 农场工人遇到这种场面 不应该觉得恶心吧？

translation.en: Who're you calling a ranch hand?
translation.zh: 你说谁是农场工人呐？

translation.en: -Sorry. Property manager. -[Manny] Thank you.
translation.zh: -抱歉 你是农场经理 -谢谢

translation.en: Never gets old.
translation.zh: 你总是乐此不疲

translation.en: So, what did she say?
translation.zh: 所以她说什么了？

translation.en: Oh. Well… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: -She's in. -[cow moos]
translation.zh: 她答应了

translation.en: She wants a sloppy joe with some ran-- [retches]
translation.zh: 她想要一个肉酱汉堡多加酱…

translation.en: Sounds like a date to me, Romeo.
translation.zh: 听起来像是要去约会哦 情种

translation.en: It's a date. Hmm.
translation.zh: 是约会哦

translation.en: [Callie] And the venue is gorgeous. It's just…
translation.zh: 场地很漂亮 只是…

translation.en: It's on hold for Christmas Eve this year. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 只是订在今年的平安夜了

translation.en: [Brandy] Cay, are you kidding? That's in, like, three weeks.
translation.zh: 凯莉 你在开玩笑吗？只有三周时间

translation.en: Is he insane? [munching]
translation.zh: 他疯了吗？

translation.en: Sorry, Joseph.
translation.zh: 抱歉 约瑟夫

translation.en: He's not here. He's in the conference room, taking a call.
translation.zh: 他不在这里 他在会议室打电话呢

translation.en: But yes, it is insane.
translation.zh: 但确实太疯狂了

translation.en: But why not?
translation.zh: 但为什么不行呢？

translation.en: I already went through planning a wedding with Liam that never happened.
translation.zh: 我已经跟利亚姆策划过一次婚礼了 虽然最后没有实现

translation.en: I'd be lying if the thought of doing it all over again didn't make me cringe.
translation.zh: 说实话 想到要重来一遍 我就觉得发怵

translation.en: And a wedding during Christmas Eve is pretty magical.
translation.zh: 不过在平安夜举行婚礼确实很梦幻

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 是吧？

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: -所以… -所以…

translation.en: So… let's do it?
