translation.en: I'm expecting a plan of some kind in the morning. My flight's at 9:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 我期待明早能有解决方案 我的航班是上午九点

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course. Thank you for stopping by.
translation.zh: 好的 当然 谢谢你过来一趟

translation.en: -If your mother was here-- -Well, she's not.
translation.zh: -如果你妈妈还在这里… -她不在了

translation.en: Have a safe flight, Harry.
translation.zh: 一路平安 哈里

translation.en: Please explain to me why the CFO flew from New York City this morning
translation.zh: 请向我解释一下 为什么首席财务官从纽约飞过来

translation.en: to personally hand me a copy of the redlines that you left unopened
translation.zh: 亲手交给我一份往来协议的副本

translation.en: and neglected for months.
translation.zh: 而几个月来 你一直视而不见

translation.en: The mail was addressed to your mother.
translation.zh: 邮件是发给你母亲的

translation.en: Yeah, but when you stepped into her role,
translation.zh: 但如果你接替她的角色了

translation.en: you had to take on her responsibilities, Victoria.
translation.zh: 就要承担她的责任 维多利亚

translation.en: Oh, stop.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: It's all about the gala, Joseph. I need to focus my attention on that
translation.zh: 全都是庆典的事 我的精力都在节日庆典上

translation.en: and not some stupid paperwork.
translation.zh: 没时间看那些愚蠢的文件

translation.en: Then who's gonna do it?
translation.zh: 那工作谁来做呢？

translation.en: Well, that's why you're here. Isn't it?
translation.zh: 这就是你来这里的原因 不是吗？

translation.en: Look. It's not just about the taxes and the bills.
translation.zh: 听着 不只是报税单和账单的问题

translation.en: We're dropping suppliers left and right.
translation.zh: 我们正在快速失去供应商

translation.en: Oh, the suppliers will come running back once they receive our annual gift.
translation.zh: 等收到我们的周年礼物 供应商们会回头的

translation.en: Especially now that the speech will come
translation.zh: 特别是今年的演讲

translation.en: from the famous Joseph Van Aston this year.
translation.zh: 将由广受关注的约瑟夫范阿斯顿发表

translation.en: Don't remind me about that speech.
translation.zh: 别跟我提演讲的事

translation.en: It's the holidays. Things will turn around.
translation.zh: 正值假期 情况会好转的

translation.en: The fate of this company will rely on the success of this gala.
translation.zh: 公司的命运取决于庆典能否成功

translation.en: More so now than any other year.
translation.zh: 今年的庆典比往年都重要

translation.en: You think so?
translation.zh: 你这样认为吗？

translation.en: -I know so. -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 我太了解了

translation.en: So, she can't have too much of this at once.
translation.zh: 所以这个她不能一次吃太多

translation.en: -I can't believe I didn't know that. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 我不知道这一点

translation.en: Well, luckily, donkeys are pretty resilient.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 驴子的适应力很强

translation.en: The extra alfalfa won't necessarily hurt her.
translation.zh: 多余的苜蓿不至于伤到她

translation.en: It'll just make her anxious and a little bloated.
translation.zh: 只会让她焦虑 有点浮肿

translation.en: -[sighs] -That's why she's so noisy.
translation.zh: 所以她才那么不安分

translation.en: It'd be like us eating cupcakes for dinner.
translation.zh: 就像我们晚餐吃纸杯蛋糕一样

translation.en: [sighs] We're on in 15 minutes, girl. Think you got another one in you?
translation.zh: 我们十五分钟后开始 姑娘 你觉得你还能再来一次吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -是啊

translation.en: Never would've known. Liam always said you were a cow whisperer.
translation.zh: 真是没想到 利亚姆总说你能跟牛沟通

translation.en: Guess that applies to donkeys as well. [laughs]
translation.zh: 看来对驴也适用

translation.en: [laughs] I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 我可没觉得

translation.en: Is she yours?
translation.zh: 她是你的吗？

translation.en: No. No. I borrow her from a rescue.
translation.zh: 不是 她是我从动物救助组织借来的

translation.en: But she's my responsibility during the holidays.
translation.zh: 但假期期间 我要对她负责

translation.en: So you put all of this on.
translation.zh: 所以这些都是你筹备的呀

translation.en: [inhales] Yeah, for the, um, last four years.
translation.zh: 是啊 已经这样四年了

translation.en: It's been so great for the community.
translation.zh: 对社区来说很有益处

translation.en: Gives the shelter folks something to look forward to during the holidays.
translation.zh: 让收容所的人们在假期里能有盼头

translation.en: But… we just lost our funding, so…
translation.zh: 但是… 我们刚刚失去赞助了 所以…

translation.en: Looks like this will be the last year. [tuts]
translation.zh: 看来这是最后一年了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I know it doesn't look like much,
translation.zh: 我知道这里看起来不怎么样

translation.en: but it takes all year long to set up the catering sponsorships, the food drive.
translation.zh: 但也花费了整整一年时间 才搞定餐饮赞助和食品募捐

translation.en: Last year we had the, uh… the third-biggest Christmas tree
translation.zh: 去年我们有旧金山

translation.en: in San Francisco.
translation.zh: 第三大的圣诞树

translation.en: -I said, "Last year." -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 我说的是“去年”

translation.en: We got lucky. It didn't fit in one of the Van Aston hotel lobbies.
translation.zh: 我们很幸运 范阿斯顿酒店的大厅放不下

translation.en: -Joseph hooked us up. -[woman] Owen.
translation.zh: -约瑟夫就联系送给我们了 -欧文

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Stick around for the show? [laughs] -Why not? [laughs]
translation.zh: -要留下来看演出吗？ -为什么不呢？

translation.en: Just cheer at the end. Otherwise I'm stand--
translation.zh: 最后一定要喝彩 否则我站在台上…

translation.en: I have to change. I'll be… just one sec… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我得去换衣服 我去…等我一下…

translation.en: So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts
translation.zh: 所以让我们把圣诞节的精神铭记于心

translation.en: for all the days of our lives.
translation.zh: 铭记一生

translation.en: [Owen] Thank you. Thank you, all.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢大家

translation.en: -Really appreciate it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我很感激 -是啊

translation.en: -Thank you for the donation. Thank you. -Yeah. See you next time.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的捐款 谢谢 -没事 下次见

translation.en: -Who knew you were quite the actor. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 没想到你还真是好演员呢

translation.en: Not that good. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我没那么好啦

translation.en: It was so good to see you again. -So good to see you. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: -很高兴又见到你了 -很高兴见到你

translation.en: Oh. This is Joseph. I should go.
translation.zh: 是约瑟夫 我该走了

translation.en: Of course. Good to see you. Bring Joseph next time.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 下次带约瑟夫来

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I'm… I'm so sorry for calling you in here, but I…
translation.zh: 我很抱歉叫你过来 但是我…

translation.en: I kinda need your advice on--
translation.zh: 我需要你的建议…

translation.en: -Why do you smell like-- -The barn? [chuckles]
translation.zh: -你为什么闻起来有股… -畜棚的味道？

translation.en: I was over at Owen's soup kitchen.
translation.zh: 我去欧文的施舍处了

translation.en: I was walking, and there was this donkey and…
translation.zh: 我走在路上 看到一头驴

translation.en: Anyway, it's a long story, but it's a really sweet thing
translation.zh: 然后…反正说来话长 不过还挺温馨的

translation.en: he has going on over there.
translation.zh: 他在那边搞这种活动

translation.en: Wait. So, you're saying you had the entire day in a city,
translation.zh: 等等 所以你是说 你在城里待了一整天

translation.en: and you still managed to find a cow pen?
translation.zh: 还是找到了一个牛棚？

translation.en: Donkey pen.
translation.zh: 是驴棚

translation.en: Refills. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 咖啡来了

translation.en: My God, that smell.
translation.zh: 天啊 这是什么味道

translation.en: I'm sorry. I was, uh, over at the soup kitchen.
translation.zh: 对不起 我去施舍处了

translation.en: You poor thing.
translation.zh: 小可怜

translation.en: We serve lunch here at 2:00 p.m. each day.
translation.zh: 我们这里每天中午两点都有午饭的

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Next time, then.
translation.zh: 下次吧

translation.en: Callie and I have been running two successful businesses the past year.
translation.zh: 过去一年 凯莉和我 经营着两家很成功的公司

translation.en: Between the dairy farm and the winery, I… I thought she'd have some good ideas.
translation.zh: 分别是奶牛场和酿酒厂 我觉得她能提供一些好主意

translation.en: I told you, after the gala, the suppliers--
translation.zh: 我跟你说了 庆典活动后 供应商…

translation.en: Look, it's not that simple, Victoria.
translation.zh: 听着 没有那么简单 维多利亚

translation.en: My mother was the face of the company. She dealt with everyone.
translation.zh: 我妈是公司的代言人 她负责跟各种人打交道

translation.en: Without those personal connections, our relationships are dropping like flies.
translation.zh: 没有这些私人关系 我们的合作关系就会分崩离析

translation.en: Okay, well, th… then we fix that.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我们就去解决呗

translation.en: I think we need to take advantage of the Christmas spirit
translation.zh: 我觉得我们需要利用圣诞精神

translation.en: and get personal with the suppliers.
translation.zh: 跟供应商搞好关系

translation.en: Bring a little small town to the big city.
translation.zh: 把小城镇带到大城市

translation.en: The main reason my family got by all of those years
translation.zh: 我们家能经营这么多年的主要原因

translation.en: wasn't because people were obsessed with our baked goods or cheeses.
translation.zh: 不是因为人们痴迷于 我们的烘焙食品或奶酪

translation.en: It was because our customers were like family, and they believed in us.
translation.zh: 因为我们的客户就像家人一样 他们相信我们

translation.en: [smacks lips] I say we give every business partner
translation.zh: 我建议我们给每个商业伙伴

translation.en: a verbal Van Aston Enterprises Christmas card, if you will.
translation.zh: 都发去范阿斯顿集团的圣诞语音祝福 如果可以这么叫的话

translation.en: We'll call every one of them,
translation.zh: 我们给他们打电话

translation.en: thank them for their partnership over the years,
translation.zh: 感谢他们多年来的合作

translation.en: tell them we can't wait to see them at the annual gala,
translation.zh: 告诉他们 我们很期待 在年度盛典上见到他们

translation.en: and wish them a Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 同时祝他们圣诞快乐

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: I'm not getting on the phone with every Tom, Dick, and Harry that we do business with.
translation.zh: 我才不要给所有生意伙伴打电话呢

translation.en: Oh, fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We'll take it from here.
translation.zh: 那就交给我们吧

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Your grandmother does the same thing? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的祖母也会这样

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我超爱的

translation.en: I'll have that confirmation sent over shortly.
translation.zh: 我马上把确认信发给你

translation.en: Look, I understand the disappointment, Tim,
translation.zh: 听着 我理解你的失望 蒂姆

translation.en: but believe me, by… by staying with us, you will…
translation.zh: 但相信我 跟我们在一起 你会…

translation.en: Um, you're gonna… By staying with us, you will…
translation.zh: 你会…跟我们在一起 你会…

translation.en: Here's the deal. Locking in the contract before the holidays will clear your head
translation.zh: 这样吧 在假期前签好合同 你就不用再想这件事了

translation.en: so you can spend time with your kids.
translation.zh: 就可以和孩子们在一起了

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, whoa, oh, oh ♪ ♪ Whoa, whoa ♪ ♪ Hold each other up ♪
♪ It's enough for us ♪ ♪ When life pulls out the rug ♪
[Brandy] Oh. How are the stitches feeling?
translation.zh: 缝针疼吗？

translation.en: She didn't pick up.
translation.zh: 她不接电话

translation.en: Yeah. Look, come on.
translation.zh: 是啊 听着

translation.en: You've had a long day. How about some hot chocolate?
translation.zh: 你今天辛苦了 来杯热巧克力怎么样？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Look, she's gonna call back,
translation.zh: 听着 她会回电话的

translation.en: and then you can tell her all about your four-wheeler accident.
translation.zh: 然后你可以跟她讲讲你的四轮车事故

translation.en: How many marshmallows do you want?
translation.zh: 你要加多少棉花糖？

translation.en: -Is that even a question? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 这是问题吗？

translation.en: That's all of them.
translation.zh: 全都打完了

translation.en: You know, they're really looking forward to this holiday gala.
translation.zh: 是啊 他们很期待这次节日庆典

translation.en: Ugh. Don't remind me. Why not?
translation.zh: -不要提醒我 -为什么呢？

translation.en: 'Cause it's… it's the one time a year we have to ask for money. [sighs]
translation.zh: 因为一年只有这一次 我们必须筹钱

translation.en: All while showing how much of it you already have.
translation.zh: 同时展示你们已经多有钱了

translation.en: They've got all wrong, don't they?
translation.zh: 他们全都想错了 是吧？

translation.en: -They do. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Oh my God. I missed three calls from Hannah.
translation.zh: 天啊 我错过三通汉娜的电话

translation.en: Don't call her now. She's probably sleeping.
translation.zh: 现在别打给她吧 她可能在睡觉

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: We've earned this. [exhales]
translation.zh: 这是我们应得的

translation.en: It's this new wine I found from the Ber…
translation.zh: 这瓶新酒是我从贝奈…

translation.en: Bern… Bernat? Bernet? I… I'm not sure how to say it.
translation.zh: 贝…贝纳特？贝奈特？ 我不知道该怎么说

translation.en: It's… it's Ber… Bern… I've heard it's good.
translation.zh: 是贝…听说很好喝

translation.en: -[smacks lips] Blueberries. -Mm-hmm
translation.zh: 蓝莓

translation.en: And chamomile?
translation.zh: 还有甘菊？

translation.en: Yes! [laughs]
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. [laughs] -That was really, really good. -[whispers] It's okay.
translation.zh: 对不起 真是太厉害了

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's… it's not you.
translation.zh: 是啊 不是因为你

translation.en: It's, um… I'm just a little distracted.
translation.zh: 我只是…有点分心

translation.en: Callie's been unreachable the last few days, and, um,
translation.zh: 这几天 一直联系不上凯莉

translation.en: I just hope she's okay.
translation.zh: 我只是希望她没事

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -She's just stressed. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 她只是压力很大

translation.en: Everyone turns into a bridezilla
translation.zh: 谁都难免变成焦虑新娘

translation.en: from time to time before their wedding day.
translation.zh: 毕竟大喜的日子就快到了

translation.en: This is Callie we're talking about. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这可是凯莉呀

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: This is Callie we're talking about.
translation.zh: 这可是凯莉呀

translation.en: She's a big girl.
translation.zh: 她是大姑娘了

translation.en: Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 是哦 行吧

translation.en: [Callie laughs] Okay. Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 好吧 你要带我去哪里？

translation.en: I thought we were going for a midnight snack.
translation.zh: 我以为我们要去吃宵夜

translation.en: -All right. Watch your step. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 好了 小心脚下

translation.en: [whispers] Right.
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: I got you.
translation.zh: 我扶着你

translation.en: Callie, I want you to meet Susan.
translation.zh: 凯莉 我想让你见见苏珊

translation.en: Susan, this is Callie.
translation.zh: 苏珊 这是凯莉

translation.en: Who's Susan?
translation.zh: 苏珊是谁？

translation.en: I named her after my grandmother.
translation.zh: 我用我祖母的名字给她命名的

translation.en: What's with the grand gesture?
translation.zh: 为什么要搞这么大的场面？

translation.en: It's just my way of saying thank you.
translation.zh: 我想这样跟你道谢

translation.en: I mean, you single-handedly helped retain 80% of our suppliers.
translation.zh: 你凭一己之力 就帮我们留住了80%的供应商

translation.en: And you look good doing it.
translation.zh: 而且做得还那么优雅自若

translation.en: -Well, you're welcome. -[Joseph chuckles]
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: And thank you.
translation.zh: 也要谢谢你

translation.en: Thanks to Victoria, I'll be returning home with an entirely new wardrobe.
translation.zh: 多亏维多利亚 我要带着一堆衣服回家了

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of Victoria…
translation.zh: 说到维多利亚

translation.en: [inhales] …it's just strange you haven't mentioned her before.
translation.zh: 你以前都没提到过她 真是奇怪呢

translation.en: Really? That's weird.
translation.zh: 是吗？好奇怪

translation.en: Cheers. [exhales]
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Now, we can focus on everything else we have to fix.
translation.zh: 现在我们可以集中精力 解决其他问题了

translation.en: I thought we fixed everything with all those phone calls.
translation.zh: 我以为通过那些电话 我们已经解决所有问题了

translation.en: Oh my gosh, no. I mean, yeah, it was… it was huge, but we still have so much more to do.
translation.zh: 天啊 是哦 我是说 这很不容易 但我们还有很多事要做

translation.en: Well, I'm here to help.
translation.zh: 我就是来帮你的

translation.en: What do you think of the city so far?
translation.zh: 目前为止 你觉得这座城市怎么样？

translation.en: I never thought I'd say this, but I love it.
translation.zh: 我从没想过自己会这么说 但我很喜欢这里

translation.en: Meetings with two-legged mammals instead of four
translation.zh: 每天跟两条腿的哺乳动物打交道

translation.en: and a new latte from a different café every day of the week.
translation.zh: 每天从不同的咖啡馆买拿铁

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我也说不好

translation.en: Maybe it wouldn't be such a bad idea to spend some more time here.
translation.zh: 也许多花些时间待在城市里 也不是坏主意

translation.en: -It's funny you say that because-- -Speaking of the time, we've been so busy.
translation.zh: -你这样说很有趣… -说到时间 我们最近太忙了

translation.en: No. I haven't signed it yet. You sent it to me yesterday.
translation.zh: 没有 我还没签呢 你昨天才寄给我的

translation.en: It's a big decision. I can't make my mind up overnight.
translation.zh: 这是重大决定 我不可能一夜之间就想清楚

translation.en: Well, I printed out a copy for you just in case.
translation.zh: 我打印了一份给你 以防万一

translation.en: -You haven't told her yet? -No.
translation.zh: -你还没告诉她吗？ -是啊

translation.en: -What about last night? -Shh.
translation.zh: 那昨晚呢？

translation.en: Best one yet.
translation.zh: 昨晚超棒的

translation.en: Okay. So, we have the venue.
translation.zh: 好吧 所以我们有场地了

translation.en: We have the suit. We have the dress.
translation.zh: 有西装了 有婚纱了

translation.en: [Callie] Ugh. Should I have bought that dress?
translation.zh: 我应该买那条婚纱吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I always thought I'd wear my mom's dress on my wedding day.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得 我结婚那天会穿我妈妈的裙子

translation.en: You'd be doing the world a disservice if you didn't wear that gorgeous dress.
translation.zh: 如果你不穿那件漂亮的婚纱 那将是全世界都损失

translation.en: Your mother will understand. Sometimes, you just have to call an audible.
translation.zh: 你妈妈会理解的 有时候也要随机应变嘛

translation.en: Call an audible?
translation.zh: 随机应变？

translation.en: I watch sports. Go Niners.
translation.zh: 我也看球赛的 淘金者队加油

translation.en: [Victoria] Hello, lovebirds.
translation.zh: 你们好呀 小情侣

translation.en: Leo. [inhales]
translation.zh: 利奥

translation.en: I want to personally thank you for the work you put in this week.
translation.zh: 我想亲自感谢你这周所做的工作

translation.en: You're like our perfect little Christmas gift, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你就是我们完美的圣诞礼物 对吧？

translation.en: -Hmm. -Thank you. I'm just happy I could help.
translation.zh: 谢谢 很高兴能帮上忙

translation.en: I told your fiancé to consider offering you an official position
translation.zh: 我告诉过你的未婚夫 等你安顿下来 就给你一个正式职位

translation.en: once you're all settled in.
translation.zh: 等你安顿下来 就给你一个正式职位

translation.en: S… settled in?
translation.zh: 安顿下来？

translation.en: I've got four gorgeous condominiums to show you, each over 3,000 square feet,
translation.zh: 我准备带你去看四套豪华公寓 面积都超过270平米

translation.en: killer views, perfect for potentially adding to the family within a year or two.
translation.zh: 景色无敌 非常适合 一两年内打算要孩子的夫妻

translation.en: You just let me know when you two cuties are ready to take a look at them.
translation.zh: 你们俩准备好去看房的时候 可以告诉我

translation.en: Condominiums?
translation.zh: 豪华公寓？

translation.en: That might be my fault.
translation.zh: 那可能是我的错

translation.en: I, um, sprang the news on them just yesterday--
translation.zh: 我昨天才告诉他们这个消息…

translation.en: Okay, what news?
translation.zh: 什么消息？

translation.en: My mother
translation.zh: 我母亲…要永久卸任

translation.en: is stepping down from her position at Van Aston Enterprises permanently.
translation.zh: 我母亲…要永久卸任 在范阿斯顿集团的职务

translation.en: The company will officially turn over to my name if I sign the paperwork.
translation.zh: 如果我签署文件 公司就会转到我的名下

translation.en: I thought you were past hiding things from me. The decision hasn't been made yet.
translation.zh: -我以为你不会对我有什么隐瞒呢 -我还没决定呢

translation.en: -I was gonna tell you last night-- -So tell me now, then.
translation.zh: -我昨晚本来要告诉你的… -那现在跟我说说吧

translation.en: What happens to our life in Petaluma?
translation.zh: 我们在佩塔卢马的生活怎么办？

translation.en: Oh, I love the life that we've created.
translation.zh: 我喜欢我们创造的生活

translation.en: But you, more than anyone, should know this is my dad's company.
translation.zh: 但你比任何人都应该知道 这是我爸的公司

translation.en: Either I sign the paperwork, or we lose everything that he worked for.
translation.zh: 如果我不签字 那他的奋斗就付诸东流了

translation.en: [Callie] You can't keep cutting me out like this.
translation.zh: 你不能总是这样 事事都不跟我商量

translation.en: It's like you're trying to get rid of me.
translation.zh: 好像是想甩掉我一样

translation.en: -God, no. Callie, we can figure this out-- -Figure yourself out.
translation.zh: -天啊 不是 凯莉 我们可以想办法的 -你自己想办法吧

translation.en: I can't marry two of you.
translation.zh: 我不能嫁给两个不同的你

translation.en: What's that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: 那是什么意思？

translation.en: I need some air.
translation.zh: 我要出去透透气

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: What did that ever do to you?
translation.zh: 相册招你惹你了？

translation.en: I don't want it. Nothing's the same.
translation.zh: 我不想要了 一切都变了

translation.en: [smacks lips] It's okay that things change, Hannah.
translation.zh: 变化也没什么大不了

translation.en: I mean, if they didn't, then you'd still be wearing diapers.
translation.zh: 如果没有变化 那你就还穿着尿布呢

translation.en: But she didn't even know I got stitches.
translation.zh: 但她都不知道我缝针了

translation.en: And now they're out, and she still doesn't care. It's like she forgot about us.
translation.zh: 现在他们出去了 她还是不在乎 她好像忘记我们了

translation.en: And it's the last Sunday before Christmas.
translation.zh: 今天圣诞节前的最后一个星期天

translation.en: This is the day we decorate our tree. She probably forgot about that too.
translation.zh: 是我们装饰圣诞树的日子 她可能也忘记了

translation.en: Hey, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Your sister's kind of busy planning the wedding of her dreams.
translation.zh: 你姐姐正忙着 筹备她梦寐以求的婚礼呢

translation.en: She's getting married Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 她要在平安夜举行婚礼

translation.en: How fun will that be?
translation.zh: 多有意思呀？

translation.en: So let's cut her some slack. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们就放她一马吧

translation.en: [inhales] You know what? When she's back, we can punish her
translation.zh: 你知道吗？等她回来 我们可以罚她

translation.en: and give her all the poopy jobs that she usually gives us, huh?
translation.zh: 把她扔给我们的脏活累活 都还给她 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -好吧 -好呢

translation.en: Let's decorate a Christmas tree so hard
translation.zh: 我们好好装饰圣诞树

translation.en: that they can see that sucker all the way from San Francisco, huh?
translation.zh: 让他们在旧金山就能看到 怎么样？

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: ♪ Of holiday reds and greens ♪
translation.zh: （怎么了？） （我缝针了 不过已经不疼了！）

translation.en: ♪ Santa will be riding in… ♪
translation.zh: （凯莉）

translation.en: -[donkey brays] -[Owen] Come see our Christmas show!
translation.zh: 快来看我们的圣诞演出！

translation.en: All tickets are donation-based.
translation.zh: 所有门票都将用于捐赠

translation.en: Profits support the homeless in the city.
translation.zh: 筹款用来接济城里的无家可归者！

translation.en: We serve warm meals all season long.
translation.zh: 圣诞节期间 供应免费餐食

translation.en: It's so crowded today.
translation.zh: 今天人真多

translation.en: Most people who come on weekends have jobs.
translation.zh: 大多数周末来的人都是有工作的

translation.en: Unless you make a fortune, the city will swallow you up.
translation.zh: 除非一夜暴富 否则城市会将你吞噬殆尽

translation.en: Especially if you got a family to feed.
translation.zh: 尤其是还要养家糊口的话

translation.en: So hard to believe.
translation.zh: 真是不敢相信

translation.en: I mean, it seems like money grows on trees in this city.
translation.zh: 我是说 我以为城里遍地是黄金

translation.en: Only for those rich enough to plant them in the first place.
translation.zh: 那也只有富人才能捡到

translation.en: Like the Van Astons.
translation.zh: 比如范阿斯顿家族

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: Speaking of, I was surprised Joseph didn't keep up the donations,
translation.zh: 说起来 我很惊讶 约瑟夫没有继续捐款了

translation.en: especially after knowing you and I grew up together.
translation.zh: 尤其是在他知道我们是儿时好友之后

translation.en: The Van Astons pay for this soup kitchen?
translation.zh: 施舍处是范阿斯顿家族赞助的？

translation.en: Yeah. You… you didn't know?
translation.zh: 是的 你不知道吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: -[sighs] The company is struggling and-- -Oh, don't feel like you need to explain.
translation.zh: -公司现在很艰难… -不要觉得你需要解释

translation.en: We're… we are lucky to have had their support for as long as we did.
translation.zh: 我们很幸运了 能得到他们那么久的支持

translation.en: Hey, Ainsley.
translation.zh: 嘿 安斯利

translation.en: You wanna help out for a bit before the show?
translation.zh: 你想在演出前帮帮忙吗？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Um, no.
translation.zh: 不了

translation.en: Ainsley, this is Callie, my friend from home.
translation.zh: 安斯利 这是凯莉 我在家乡的朋友

translation.en: Uh, we hired Ainsley to be our Mother Mary this year.
translation.zh: 今年我们雇了安斯利扮演圣母玛利亚

translation.en: Yeah, about that. I can't make it tonight.
translation.zh: 是啊 我今晚不能演了

translation.en: I booked a job, so…
translation.zh: 我预订了一个活儿 所以…

translation.en: We're on in 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 我们20分钟后就要登场了

translation.en: Not my problem.
translation.zh: 不关我的事

translation.en: Who can I possibly find
translation.zh: 在接下来的20分钟里

translation.en: to play Mother Mary in the next 20 minutes?
translation.zh: 我能找谁来扮演圣母玛利亚呢？

translation.en: I forgot my phone.
translation.zh: 我忘拿手机了

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: You sure this is okay?
translation.zh: 你确定这样可以吗？

translation.en: 'Cause we have two performances. You'll be here all day…
translation.zh: 我们有两场演出 你要在这里待一整天…

translation.en: -I got… I gotta change. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 我得去换衣服了

translation.en: What's with the outfit?
translation.zh: 这身打扮是怎么回事？

translation.en: I thought you needed an excuse.
translation.zh: 我觉得你需要一个借口

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: Probably more than you'll make all month.
translation.zh: 比你一个月挣的还多

translation.en: You're welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便吧

translation.en: [Owen] All bringing forth what would soon be known
translation.zh: 这位新生的孩子很快将被人们视为

translation.en: as the most precious gift the world would ever receive.
translation.zh: 世间前所未有的最珍贵的礼物

translation.en: The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.zh: 上帝以弱小的婴儿形象 出现在我们面前

translation.en: So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts
translation.zh: 所以让我们把圣诞节的精神铭记于心

translation.en: for all the days of our lives.
translation.zh: 铭记一生

translation.en: [Owen] Thank you. Thank you all! That's it for now.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢大家！演出到此结束

translation.en: Stick around for the next show, if you'd like.
translation.zh: 如果愿意 可以留下观看下一场演出

translation.en: -Pet Hopey. She's very, very nice. -[Callie laughs]
translation.zh: 驴子宝贝 她表现得非常好

translation.en: [recording] Hey, friends. You've reached Callie Bernet.
translation.zh: 嘿 朋友 我是凯莉贝奈特

translation.en: Please leave a message.
translation.zh: 请留言

translation.en: [Owen] You killed it today.
translation.zh: 你今天表现得太好了

translation.en: You're a natural Virgin.
translation.zh: 你就是天生的处女圣母

translation.en: -Please never say that again. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 求你别再这么说了

translation.en: Well, I may be selfish, but I'd love to have you in the city.
translation.zh: 我可能有点自私 但我想让你留在城里

translation.en: [smacks lips] I missed you.
translation.zh: 我很想你

translation.en: It really does feel like yesterday.
translation.zh: 感觉就像昨天一样

translation.en: You and Liam begging me to drive you to the movies.
translation.zh: 你和利亚姆求我开车送你们去看电影

translation.en: Life was so simple back then.
translation.zh: 那时的生活多单纯啊

translation.en: You don't remember, do you?
translation.zh: 你不记得了吧？

translation.en: Remember what?
translation.zh: 记得什么？

translation.en: How you and Liam used to fight like dogs over your futures.
translation.zh: 讨论到你们的未来 你和利亚姆吵得不可开交

translation.en: He wanted you to follow him to UC Davis.
translation.zh: 他想让你跟他去加州大学戴维斯分校

translation.en: You wouldn't have that. You had to go to St. Louis
translation.zh: 你不愿意 你想像你父亲一样

translation.en: to study social economics and agriculture like your dad.
translation.zh: 去圣路易斯学习社会经济学和农学

translation.en: I swear you two had a different plan every week.
translation.zh: 我发誓你俩每周都有不同的计划

translation.en: And then we never even got the chance to choose one.
translation.zh: 最后我们连选择的机会都没有了

translation.en: You would've worked it out 'cause you loved each other.
translation.zh: 你们本来也会解决的 因为你们深爱着对方

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Relationships are all about compromise.
translation.zh: 人与人相处就是妥协

translation.en: You can't force Joseph to stay away from the city
translation.zh: 你不能强迫约瑟夫离开城市

translation.en: any more than he can force you to walk away from the farm.
translation.zh: 就像他不能强迫你离开农场一样

translation.en: You and Joseph will work it out.
translation.zh: 你和约瑟夫也会想出解决办法的

translation.en: [Victoria] Where you headed?
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？

translation.en: Um, j… just back to the hotel. It's a block away. I can walk.
translation.zh: 回酒店而已 只有一个街区 我可以走路回去

translation.en: Nonsense.
translation.zh: 得了吧

translation.en: Vanilla chai, right?
translation.zh: 你喜欢香草茶 是吧？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Tell me, how are you feeling about everything, dear?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 跟我说说 你觉得这里怎么样？

translation.en: I'm just a little tired of it all, to be honest.
translation.zh: 老实说 我有点累了

translation.en: Oh, honey.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的

translation.en: If you're tired now, wait until you're a few days out from the big day. You won't sleep a wink.
translation.zh: 如果你现在就觉得累了 那等到临近婚礼时 你会失眠的

translation.en: I was awake for a full 36 hours before my wedding.
translation.zh: 婚礼前整整36小时 我都没有睡觉

translation.en: How long have you been married?
translation.zh: 你结婚多久了？

translation.en: The wedding never happened. We called it off.
translation.zh: 没有举行婚礼 我们取消了

translation.en: More like he called it off.
translation.zh: 应该说是他取消了

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾

translation.en: I have to say it looks much better on your hand than it did on mine.
translation.zh: 我得说 戒指戴在你的手上 比我戴好看多了

translation.en: I always thought my hands were a little too long for an emerald cut.
translation.zh: 我一直觉得我的手有点长 不适合戴切割绿宝石

translation.en: Looks better on thicker hands.
translation.zh: 还是厚一点的手掌戴着更好看

translation.en: You see how the shape elongates the wrist in a way?
translation.zh: 能看出来戒指形状显得手腕很长吗？

translation.en: No offense, of… of course. It's beyond gorgeous.
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 戒指还是很美的

translation.en: Oh, he didn't tell you we were engaged?
translation.zh: 他没告诉你 我们曾经订婚了？

translation.en: [inhales] Oh my.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: It seems I'm always revealing too much too soon.
translation.zh: 看来我又说漏嘴了

translation.en: -Callie, what are you doing? -Owen's soup kitchen lost all its funding.
translation.zh: -凯莉 你在干什么？ -欧文的施舍处失去了所有资助

translation.en: That's what this is about?
translation.zh: 就是因为这事吗？

translation.en: Cal, we had to make cuts to keep the lights on.
translation.zh: 凯莉 我们必须削减开支 才能维持公司运营

translation.en: I told him we'd try to pick it up after the gala if the suppliers reconfirmed, but--
translation.zh: 我跟他说了 如果供应商回心转意 我们会继续捐款的…

translation.en: The company can afford to put on a gala
translation.zh: 公司有能力举办庆典

translation.en: that costs more than what most people make in a year,
translation.zh: 花费比大多数人的年收入还多

translation.en: and you're telling me you can't afford to help people
translation.zh: 你却跟我说 没钱去捐款

translation.en: who would give anything for a hot meal during the holidays?
translation.zh: 帮助那些在节日期间 施舍饭食的人吗？

translation.en: The wedding venue, how much does that cost?
translation.zh: 婚礼场地呢 要花多少钱？

translation.en: You know, we could get married at the winery for free.
translation.zh: 我们可以在酿酒厂举办婚礼 不用花钱

translation.en: That's what I pictured for us.
translation.zh: 那才是我对我们婚礼的设想

translation.en: [sighs] You and me, a few special guests, my family's land.
translation.zh: 有你有我 请一些特别的宾客 在我家的土地上

translation.en: But you wouldn't know that, would you? Because you never asked me.
translation.zh: 但你不会知道我的想法的 对吧？ 因为你从没问过我

translation.en: And I don't understand how you can stand there
translation.zh: 我不明白 我们经历过那么多

translation.en: and continue to keep secrets from me after everything we've been through.
translation.zh: 你怎么还能站在这里继续向我隐瞒！

translation.en: If you wanted to give me a secondhand ring,
translation.zh: 如果你想送我一枚二手戒指

translation.en: you could have asked me for Liam's.
translation.zh: 你可以问我要利亚姆送我的那枚

translation.en: It's cut better for my fat fingers, according to Victoria.
translation.zh: 按照维多利亚的说法 更适合我的胖手指

translation.en: [Joseph] Victoria? What are you talking about--
translation.zh: 维多利亚？凯莉 你在说什么？

translation.en: I'm glad we came here
translation.zh: 我很高兴我们来到这里

translation.en: to realize that you belong in this city, Joseph.
translation.zh: 让我意识到 你是属于城市的 约瑟夫

translation.en: I don't.
translation.zh: 而我不是

translation.en: All right. All right. Spit it out.
translation.zh: 好吧 不吐不快

translation.en: -The wine? -No! Not the wine!
translation.zh: -你说酒吗？ -不是！不是吐酒！

translation.en: No. Y… you said you wanted to walk and talk,
translation.zh: 你说你想边走边聊

translation.en: and so we walked and talked all the way up here.
translation.zh: 所以我们就一路走到这里了

translation.en: My calves hurt, and I know that you got more on your mind.
translation.zh: 我小腿都走疼了 我知道你有很多心事

translation.en: [smacks lips] You don't have to be afraid because I'm…
translation.zh: 你不用害怕 因为我…

translation.en: [mumbling] …falling in love with you.
translation.zh: 爱上你了

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -什么？

translation.en: [smacks lips] I'm…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: falling in love with you.
translation.zh: 爱上你了

translation.en: -Oh, wow, uh… -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: No. I just wasn't expecting--
translation.zh: 不用 我只是没想到…

translation.en: -No, I get it. That's… that's fine. -That's why I was gonna…
translation.zh: -没事 我懂的 没关系 -所以我才要…

translation.en: -Wow. Um… -Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I think I'm falling for you too.
translation.zh: 我觉得我也爱上你了

translation.en: I mean, I am.
translation.zh: 我是说 是的

translation.en: I'm falling in love with you.
translation.zh: 我爱上你了

translation.en: For real?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: -[Brandy] Mm-hmm. -You are?
translation.zh: 你有吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Okay, just…
translation.zh: 好了 只是…

translation.en: Okay. You do so much for Callie
translation.zh: 好吧 你为凯莉和她的家人

translation.en: and her family
translation.zh: 还有这片土地

translation.en: and this land. [exhales heavily]
translation.zh: 付出了很多

translation.en: I just…
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I wanna know what you want.
translation.zh: 我想知道你想要什么

translation.en: Where do you see yourself
translation.zh: 你觉得五年或十年后

translation.en: in, like, five, ten years?
translation.zh: 自己会在哪里呢？

translation.en: [Victoria] Joseph? Joseph!
translation.zh: 约瑟夫！

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: you got what you wanted.
translation.zh: 你得到了你想要的

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: [Joseph] You drove her away
translation.zh: 你把她赶走了

translation.en: because you're still not over that you and I didn't work out.
translation.zh: 因为我们没能走到最后 你还耿耿于怀

translation.en: [Victoria] Oh, Joseph,
translation.zh: 约瑟夫

translation.en: tell me you're not blaming me for your lack of honesty.
translation.zh: 你总是对我不坦诚 不能怪我

translation.en: You know how much she means to me.
translation.zh: 你知道她对我有多重要

translation.en: I didn't do anything wrong.
translation.zh: 我没做错什么

translation.en: You only have yourself to blame.
translation.zh: 只能怪你自己

translation.en: [inhales] Besides,
translation.zh: 还有

translation.en: seems like you both dodged a bit of a bullet.
translation.zh: 似乎你们俩都躲过了一劫

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [smacks lips] I should probably cancel the venue.
translation.zh: 我应该取消场地预约了

translation.en: Picture's in your email.
translation.zh: 照片发到你的邮箱里了

translation.en: -Do you wanna talk about it now or later? -Nope!
translation.zh: -你想现在说 还是过会再说？ -不要！

translation.en: You know, I was right.
translation.zh: 我是对的

translation.en: I kept him on the farm all year long to avoid the inevitable.
translation.zh: 我让他整年待在农场里 以避免这些不必要的事端

translation.en: And… and a recycled ring from an ex-fiancée I knew nothing about?
translation.zh: 我完全不知道他有过未婚妻 他送我的是二手戒指啊？

translation.en: -God! -Maybe there's more to this story.
translation.zh: -天啊！ -也许故事还有隐情

translation.en: It doesn't matter. For him to even consider that I'd uproot my life
translation.zh: 不重要了 难道为了他 我要背井离乡

translation.en: and leave everything behind?
translation.zh: 抛下一切吗？

translation.en: What is that face?
translation.zh: 这是什么表情？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Wasn't that what he did for you this past year?
translation.zh: 这不正是他过去一年为你所做的吗？

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不是！

translation.en: Yes! But it's not the same thing.
translation.zh: 是的！但这不是一码事

translation.en: [Brandy] Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [smacks lips] Well, at least the farm is still standing, huh?
translation.zh: 好了 至少农场还在 对吧？

translation.en: We didn't burn it down.
translation.zh: 我们没有把它烧掉！

translation.en: How's Manny?
translation.zh: 曼尼怎么样？

translation.en: [high-pitched] He's good!
translation.zh: 他很好！

translation.en: So good.
translation.zh: 特别好

translation.en: [Joseph] I know I royally messed up.
translation.zh: 我知道我又以皇室的方式搞砸了

translation.en: -[Leo] Again. -[Joseph] Again.
translation.zh: -又一次 -又一次

translation.en: But Owen and Callie?
translation.zh: 但欧文和凯莉在一起？

translation.en: It just doesn't seem right. It's… it's her dead fiancé's brother.
translation.zh: 这似乎不太对 欧文是她过世未婚夫的哥哥

translation.en: Like, what?
translation.zh: 这像什么话？

translation.en: Things aren't always what they seem. Let the dust settle.
translation.zh: 所见未必是真相 先别太早下结论

translation.en: Call her in a few days.
translation.zh: 过几天再给她打电话

translation.en: You've got the gala tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 你先集中精力在明晚的庆典上

translation.en: Focus on that. She'll come around before the wedding.
translation.zh: 你先集中精力在明晚的庆典上 -她会在婚礼前回心转意的 -什么婚礼？

translation.en: What wedding?
translation.zh: -她会在婚礼前回心转意的 -什么婚礼？

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: I'll take that.
translation.zh: 我先拿走了

translation.en: -Do you still have the paperwork? -Of course.
translation.zh: -文件还在吗？ -当然了

translation.en: With Callie and I up in the air, my dad's legacy is all I have.
translation.zh: 凯莉和我前途未卜 我只剩我爸的遗产了

translation.en: And I have a feeling that she's not coming back.
translation.zh: 我感觉她不会回来了

translation.en: I think you're right.
translation.zh: 我觉得你说得对

translation.en: From what she's posting on social media, she's on island.
translation.zh: 从她发的朋友圈来看 她在…

translation.en: Ugh.
translation.zh: 岛上

translation.en: What is wrong with you? I was talking about Callie!
translation.zh: 你在搞什么？我说的是凯莉！

translation.en: But thank you. I can't unsee that.
translation.zh: 但是谢谢 我要去洗眼睛了

translation.en: What is it you really want?
translation.zh: 你到底想要什么？

translation.en: I wanna marry Callie.
translation.zh: 我想跟凯莉结婚

translation.en: She wants to marry you too.
translation.zh: 她也想跟你结婚

translation.en: She just can't marry two of me.
translation.zh: 她不能嫁给两个我

translation.en: [Leo] Well, who's the real you?
translation.zh: 好吧 哪个才是真正的你？

translation.en: [Callie exhales] Here we go.
translation.zh: 我们到了

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: -Han? -[Hannah] Not hungry.
translation.zh: -汉娜？ -我不饿

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I saw the tree!
translation.zh: 我看到圣诞树了！

translation.en: You guys did a great job. How'd you get so many lights to fit?
translation.zh: 你们装饰得真好 怎么挂上去那么多灯的？

translation.en: [Hannah] Manny helped because you weren't here.
translation.zh: 因为你不在 都是靠曼尼帮忙

translation.en: I got stitches.
translation.zh: 我缝针了

translation.en: I heard you were the best stitches patient that doctor had ever seen.
translation.zh: 我听说 你是医生见过的 最听话的外伤病人

translation.en: -I didn't cry. -I don't doubt it.
translation.zh: -我没有哭 -我相信你

translation.en: Where's Joseph?
translation.zh: 约瑟夫呢？

translation.en: Uh, he's… he's not back yet.
translation.zh: 他还没回来

translation.en: Oh boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Allow me, madame.
translation.zh: 我来帮你 女士

translation.en: -[quietly] Thank you. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Hannah's not joining us?
translation.zh: 汉娜不跟我们一起吃吗？

translation.en: Not until Joseph shows up.
translation.zh: 要等到约瑟夫出现

translation.en: -What? -[whispers] Tell her.
translation.zh: -什么？ -告诉她吧

translation.en: [whispers] Tell her what? You want me-- No. I'm not gonna tell her.
translation.zh: 告诉她什么？你想让我… 不要 我不会告诉她的

translation.en: -Tell her. -I'm not gonna tell her tonight. It's--
translation.zh: 我今晚不会跟她说的 不会…

translation.en: What is going on between you two?
translation.zh: 你俩之间是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Manny] Okay. Last week, I saw her do something with her lips,
translation.zh: 好吧 上周我看到她在拨弄嘴唇

translation.en: and I knew… I knew at that moment that she wanted the goods!
translation.zh: 那一刻我就知道了 她想要点甜头！

translation.en: Okay. Hold-- Wait! Hold on. What? You guys are…
translation.zh: 好了 等等！等一下 什么？你们俩…

translation.en: You guys…
translation.zh: 你们俩…

translation.en: When I was gone. Am I getting this right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不在的时候 你们好上了 是吗？

translation.en: Wow. I mean, I'm so happy for you guys!
translation.zh: 我是说 我真为你们开心！

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Jeez, what else happened when I was gone?
translation.zh: 天啊 我不在的时候 还发生什么事了？

translation.en: -No! Hmm? -What?
translation.zh: -不是！ -什么？

translation.en: No way. This is delicious. Thank you!
translation.zh: 不是吧 太好吃了 谢谢！

translation.en: -[exhales] -So good. -It's so good. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -说真的 太好吃了 -太好吃了

translation.en: -And you're not gonna tell her? -I'm not. No.
translation.zh: -你不打算跟她说吗？ -是的

translation.en: -Can I tell her? -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 我能跟她说吗？

translation.en: -[Brandy clears throat] -All right! Everything okay?
translation.zh: -好啦！ -没事吧？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Ten years ago,
translation.zh: 十年前

translation.en: when I moved to California, I had very few goals.
translation.zh: 在我搬到加州时 我没有太多目标

translation.en: Um, I thought I'd find a place to stay for free
translation.zh: 我只想找一个免费的住处

translation.en: and make enough money to buy some video games… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 赚足够的钱 买电子游戏

translation.en: …but what I hadn't realized until I started working here
translation.zh: 但直到我开始在这里工作 我才意识到

translation.en: was I was searching for a family all along.
translation.zh: 我一直在期待能有一个家庭

translation.en: [choking up] I, uh… [clears throat] I've been on my own for a while now,
translation.zh: 我已经单身有一段时间了

translation.en: and, uh, this is the first time in my life
translation.zh: 这是我人生中第一次觉得

translation.en: that I've ever felt like I belong somewhere.
translation.zh: 自己心有所属了

translation.en: You, Hannah, this land.
translation.zh: 你 汉娜 这片土地

translation.en: You're my family.
translation.zh: 你们就是我的家人

translation.en: And, uh,
translation.zh: 以及

translation.en: I love you guys. I would do anything for you all.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 我会为你做任何事

translation.en: Okay, I have cried enough in the past 24 hours.
translation.zh: 好吧 过去24小时 我已经哭很多次了

translation.en: -If you don't stop-- -Okay. I… I'll… I'll cut to the chase. Um…
translation.zh: -如果你不停下来… -好吧 那我说重点

translation.en: I plan on building a family of my own one day.
translation.zh: 我打算将来有一天 组建自己的家庭

translation.en: Give them the same joy and support and acceptance
translation.zh: 给他们同样的快乐、支持和接纳

translation.en: that you've given me, but I can't do that unless
translation.zh: 就像你给我的一样 但我必须有一片属于自己的土地

translation.en: I have a piece of land to call my own.
translation.zh: 否则我是无法做到那些的

translation.en: I've, um…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I've reworked some of the numbers here, and Manny can continue working here as is,
translation.zh: 我重新修改了一些数据 曼尼可以继续在这里工作

translation.en: but instead of being paid in full each month,
translation.zh: 但不是每个月都拿全额工资

translation.en: 15% can go towards purchasing a 12-acre plot out of your 200.
translation.zh: 15%可以用来从你的80平方公里土地 购买一块0.05平方公里的土地

translation.en: In five years, he can have ownership of the land for a fair price.
translation.zh: 五年后 他可以以合理的价格 拥有这片土地

translation.en: And there's this tree that gives this bomb-ass midafternoon shade
translation.zh: 那里还会有一棵树 能在午后给你提供荫凉

translation.en: that I think would be really--
translation.zh: 我觉得会很棒

translation.en: -Yes! -What?
translation.zh: 我觉得会很棒 -太好了！ -什么？

translation.en: I can't believe I didn't think of this sooner.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 我没有早点想到！

translation.en: Really? You'll sell me some of your land?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你要把部分土地卖给我吗？

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Yay! -[Manny] Thank you. This is awesome!
translation.zh: -耶！ -谢谢 太棒了！

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Manny, is everything okay?
translation.zh: 曼尼 你没事吧？

translation.en: -Is Callie there? -She is!
translation.zh: -凯莉在吗？ -是的！

translation.en: Can I talk to her?
translation.zh: 我能跟她谈谈吗？

translation.en: He wants to know… You know what? I actually think she's busy.
translation.zh: 他想知道…知道吗？我觉得她很忙

translation.en: But listen, there's a lot I gotta tell you, okay?
translation.zh: 但是我有很多事要告诉你 好吗？

translation.en: I was thinking about my future, and I talked to Callie,
translation.zh: 我在考虑我的未来 我和凯莉谈过了

translation.en: and she'll let me buy some of the land. Isn't that great? I mean, it's perfect! There's this great spot…
translation.zh: 她允许我买一些土地 很棒吧？ 我是说 太完美了！

translation.en: [mom] Oh, I'm sorry, baby.
translation.zh: 对不起 宝贝

translation.en: I really should have paid to have it stored properly.
translation.zh: 我真应该花钱 把裙子妥善保存好

translation.en: It's so beautiful.
translation.zh: 好漂亮啊

translation.en: -You're beautiful. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 你也很漂亮

translation.en: Well, what do you think? I don't know!
translation.zh: -你觉得怎么样？ -我不知道！

translation.en: -Go try it on! -Can I try it on?
translation.zh: -去试试吧！ -我可以试穿吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Okay.
translation.zh: -好啊！ -好呢

translation.en: [mom] Oh my gosh!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Oh, honey, it's stunning.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 太美了

translation.en: -I really like it. -You do?
translation.zh: -我好喜欢啊 -是吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我好喜欢啊 -是吗？ 好呢

translation.en: I just… [exhales]
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I hope for a marriage as good as you and Dad.
translation.zh: 我希望能有你和爸爸那样的婚姻

translation.en: Have I ever told you the story of the invisible backpack?
translation.zh: 我跟你讲过隐形背包的故事吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] No. -No.
translation.zh: -没有 -没有

translation.en: Well, see, when we're born,
translation.zh: 当我们出生时

translation.en: we all come with this invisible backpack,
translation.zh: 我们都带着“隐形背包”

translation.en: you know, to put your experiences and… and your memories in.
translation.zh: 把自己的经历和记忆装进去

translation.en: You know, for some people, well, that backpack just weighs a few pounds.
translation.zh: 对有些人来说 背包只有几公斤重

translation.en: Gosh, you hardly even notice it's there.
translation.zh: 天啊 都很难注意到

translation.en: But for others, it can feel like the weight of the world
translation.zh: 但对其他人来说 会感觉自己肩膀上

translation.en: just sits on their shoulders.
translation.zh: 背负着无法承受之重

translation.en: And sometimes, you don't find out what's in your partner's backpack
translation.zh: 有时候 直到你步入婚姻 你才会发现

translation.en: until you are well into a marriage.
translation.zh: 伴侣的背包里有什么

translation.en: That's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: We all have baggage, you know?
translation.zh: 我们都有包袱 你懂吗？

translation.en: Parts of ourselves we'd rather keep hidden
translation.zh: 我们有时宁愿隐藏起来…

translation.en: and tucked away even from those we love the most.
translation.zh: 甚至不让我们最爱的人知道

translation.en: You have to accept what's in your partner's backpack
translation.zh: 你必须接纳伴侣背包里的东西

translation.en: before its contents are revealed…
translation.zh: 赶在其中的内容被揭露之前…

translation.en: or else you'll have a very long and rocky road ahead of you.
translation.zh: 否则你将面临一段漫长坎坷的道路

translation.en: You have to carry each other's burdens.
translation.zh: 你们必须肩负起彼此的重担

translation.en: But, Mama, I think I know everything there is to know about Liam. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但是 妈妈 我觉得 我对利亚姆已经了如指掌了

translation.en: I… I know you do, baby, but
translation.zh: 我知道你很了解他 但是…

translation.en: there may come a day when you see something in him that he was
translation.zh: 也许有一天 你会在他身上看到 他不敢向你展示的东西

translation.en: afraid to show you.
translation.zh: 他不敢向你展示的东西

translation.en: But hey, you know his heart. Right?
translation.zh: 但你知道他的内心 对吧？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Forgiveness is a superpower!
translation.zh: 原谅是一种超能力！

translation.en: -"Seventy times seven." -Yeah.
translation.zh: -“永怀原谅之心” -是啊

translation.en: -[mom] I love you. -[Callie] I love you too.
translation.zh: -我爱你 -我也爱你

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -Hey! -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -喂！ -对不起

translation.en: Oh. No, hon, I'm sorry, okay?
translation.zh: 不要 亲爱的 是我对不起 好吗？

translation.en: I got so overwhelmed and busy. I should have checked in with you more.
translation.zh: 我太忙了 我应该多跟你交流的

translation.en: Are you and Joseph still getting married?
translation.zh: 你和约瑟夫还要结婚吗？

translation.en: [smacks lips] Hey. You and me are a team. Okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 你和我是亲姐妹 好吗？

translation.en: I promise to never be too busy for my little sister ever again. Okay?
translation.zh: 我保证再也不会 忙得顾不上我妹妹了 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Do you forgive me?
translation.zh: -好呢 -你能原谅我吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[chuckles] Let me see that cool scar!
translation.zh: -是啊 -让我看看酷酷的伤疤！

translation.en: Ouch. Did it hurt?
translation.zh: 哎呀 疼吗？

translation.en: Keep your head up.
translation.zh: 把头抬起来

translation.en: Love you, kid.
translation.zh: 爱你 孩子

translation.en: [Joseph] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey, man! Hi.
translation.zh: 嘿 老兄！你好呀

translation.en: You have something you want to say to me?
translation.zh: 你有话想对我说吗？

translation.en: Don't sweat it. You know, Callie said you guys have been struggling a bit.
translation.zh: 别担心 凯莉说你们最近有点困难

translation.en: Things happen.
translation.zh: 这种事情是会发生的

translation.en: Things happen?
translation.zh: 是会发生吗？

translation.en: Yeah, things happen in every relationship. That doesn't mean you can move in whenev--
translation.zh: 没错 每段感情都会有小插曲 但这并不意味着你可以插足…

translation.en: Move in on…
translation.zh: 插足什么…

translation.en: What are you talking about, man?
translation.zh: 你在说什么 伙计？

translation.en: I'm talking about you and Callie. Who else would I be talking about?
translation.zh: 我在说你和凯莉 我还能说谁呢？

translation.en: I… I'm talking about the soup kitchen.
translation.zh: 我是在说施舍处

translation.en: Callie and I are just friends.
translation.zh: 我和凯莉只是普通朋友

translation.en: She and my brother were high school sweethearts before he died.
translation.zh: 她和我弟弟在高中时就是情侣了

translation.en: I… I would never go there with her.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会跟她在一起的

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Then how do you explain this?
translation.zh: 那你怎么解释这张照片呢？

translation.en: Someone must've taken that during the last performance.
translation.zh: 这是有人在上次表演时拍的

translation.en: Look, same costume. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你看啊 一样的服装

translation.en: Performance?
translation.zh: 表演？

translation.en: My Mother Mary walked out on me for a day, so Callie filled in for her.
translation.zh: 我们的圣母玛丽那天放鸽子了 所以凯莉顶替她了

translation.en: -She didn't… she didn't tell you? -[sighs]
translation.zh: 她没告诉你吗？

translation.en: No, no. I think she forgot to mention it. [exhales]
translation.zh: 没有 她可能忘记提起了

translation.en: -I owe her one. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我欠她一个人情 这些孩子坐了一天的公交车

translation.en: See, these kids spend all day on the bus just to come to watch the live show,
translation.zh: 我欠她一个人情 这些孩子坐了一天的公交车 就为了来看现场表演

translation.en: see the donkey.
translation.zh: 来看小驴

translation.en: You know what? Uh,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: don't pack up too much.
translation.zh: 先别着急撤走

translation.en: I think we can make budget cuts somewhere else.
translation.zh: 我们可以在其他地方削减一些预算的

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, man. S… S… stick around for the show!
translation.zh: 谢谢你 伙计 留下看表演吧！

translation.en: Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: Listen. I'm gonna cut to the chase because the service here is awful!
translation.zh: 听着 我就开门见山了 因为这里的手机信号太糟糕了！

translation.en: Victoria said the wedding's off. What happened?
translation.zh: 维多利亚说婚礼取消了 怎么回事？

translation.en: Look, I… I thought we could do it all.
translation.zh: 我以为我们都能做到的

translation.en: But you should have seen her.
translation.zh: 但你应该见见她 她凭一己之力

translation.en: I mean, she was single-handedly closing suppliers we never would've locked in.
translation.zh: 但你应该见见她 她凭一己之力 就搞定了我们一直没有摆平的供应商

translation.en: That doesn't surprise me.
translation.zh: 我不觉得意外

translation.en: And I completely ruined it.
translation.zh: 结果被我彻底搞砸了

translation.en: Neither does that.
translation.zh: 我也不意外呢

translation.en: How could you leave me with this decision?
translation.zh: 你怎么能让我做这种决定？

translation.en: Because I knew you'd make the right one!
translation.zh: 因为我知道 你会做出正确的抉择！

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 怎么做呢？

translation.en: Before your father started the business, it was an idea
translation.zh: 你父亲做生意之前 那只是我们 在单间公寓里面的一个想法

translation.en: in our one-bedroom apartment.
translation.zh: 那只是我们 在单间公寓里面的一个想法

translation.en: Even though the money came along, it was never about that.
translation.zh: 即使赚钱了 但赚钱从来不是关键

translation.en: If your father were here,
translation.zh: 如果你父亲还在

translation.en: he'd tell you he didn't work a day in his life.
translation.zh: 他会告诉你 他一生都不是在工作

translation.en: When your father died, I… I got lost in it all. I…
translation.zh: 你父亲去世以后 我完全迷失了 我…

translation.en: The city, the money.
translation.zh: 城市 金钱

translation.en: You and Callie showed me what it was like to follow my heart.
translation.zh: 你和凯莉让我明白 要如何追随自己的内心

translation.en: It led me here!
translation.zh: 所以我才来这里的！

translation.en: I'll never be able to thank you enough.
translation.zh: 我对你们感激不尽

translation.en: So, where does that leave me?
translation.zh: 那我该怎么办呢？

translation.en: Make it right, Joseph.
translation.zh: 去纠正错误 约瑟夫

translation.en: You did it once. You can do it again.
translation.zh: 你以前做到了 可以再做一次的

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈

translation.en: God, I miss you.
translation.zh: 天啊！我好想你

translation.en: This isn't easy.
translation.zh: 太不容易了

translation.en: "Seventy times seven"?
translation.zh: 永怀原谅之心？

translation.en: Seems like one too many mistakes.
translation.zh: 感觉已经超出原谅的限度了

translation.en: But you were right.
translation.zh: 但你说得对

translation.en: I know his heart.
translation.zh: 我知道他的内心

translation.en: I love him.
translation.zh: 我爱他

translation.en: I would forgive him 1,000 more times if I had to.
translation.zh: 如果有必要 我会再原谅他一千次

translation.en: Am I crazy? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我疯了吗？

translation.en: I wish you could be here.
translation.zh: 真希望你能在这里

translation.en: The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.zh: 上帝以弱小的婴儿形象 出现在我们面前

translation.en: Not with red carpets, limousines,
translation.zh: 没有红地毯 没有豪华轿车

translation.en: paparazzi, and press releases,
translation.zh: 没有狗仔队 没有新闻稿

translation.en: but silently,
translation.zh: 而是默默降生

translation.en: in the quiet of the night.
translation.zh: 在安静的夜晚

translation.en: This time of year, we…
translation.zh: 每年的这个时候 我们…

translation.en: we tend to look out at the hustle and bustle
translation.zh: 我们倾向于看到世界的熙熙攘攘

translation.en: of the world's busy lives,
translation.zh: 喧嚣忙碌

translation.en: and for once, we become more interested in people than in things.
translation.zh: 而这一次 我们会变得更关注人 而不是物质

translation.en: The best things in life
translation.zh: 人生中最美好的东西

translation.en: aren't things at all.
translation.zh: 根本不是物质

translation.en: So, let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts.
translation.zh: 所以让我们把圣诞节的精神铭记于心

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: this is as good as it gets without Victoria's fancy wardrobe.
translation.zh: 没有维多利亚的华丽衣服 也很好看呢

translation.en: Hey, you're perfect!
translation.zh: 嘿 你很完美的！

translation.en: Who needs designer brands when you got a body like that?
translation.zh: 拥有这样的身材 谁还需要名牌呢？

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 我们来吧

translation.en: Let's.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [inhales] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Victoria whining] Joseph, you can't do this!
translation.zh: 约瑟夫 你不能这样做！

translation.en: -I can, and I already did. -But this is suicide!
translation.zh: -我可以的 我已经做了 -但这是自杀！

translation.en: What do I tell the board members? The guests arrive in 20 minutes, Joseph.
translation.zh: 我要怎么跟董事会成员说？ 客人们20分钟后就到了 约瑟夫

translation.en: I don't know. Uh, have them stay at one of our hotels for the weekend.
translation.zh: 我不知道 让他们在我们的酒店过周末吧

translation.en: Or better yet, have them turn their private jets around
translation.zh: 最好让他们把私人飞机调头

translation.en: so they can go home for the holidays.
translation.zh: 回家过节去

translation.en: [Harry] Too late.
translation.zh: 太迟了

translation.en: [gasps] Harry.
translation.zh: 哈里

translation.en: Gentlemen,
translation.zh: 先生们

translation.en: believe me, I will take care of everything.
translation.zh: 相信我 我会处理好一切的

translation.en: Joseph doesn't realize the importance of this evening.
translation.zh: 约瑟夫不知道今晚的重要性

translation.en: [Joseph] Merry Christmas, Harry.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 哈里

translation.en: How's the wife, kids?
translation.zh: 你的妻儿怎么样？

translation.en: They're fine.
translation.zh: 他们挺好的

translation.en: How old is your youngest?
translation.zh: 你的小儿子多大了？

translation.en: Is he… He was nine? Ten?
translation.zh: 九岁？十岁？

translation.en: Eight.
translation.zh: 八岁

translation.en: Uh, where are you going with this, Joseph? We have no time.
translation.zh: 你要闹哪样 约瑟夫 ？我们没时间了

translation.en: I saw a kid today.
translation.zh: 我今天看到一个孩子

translation.en: He didn't have shoes on, and he was about your son's age.
translation.zh: 他没有鞋穿 跟你的儿子年纪相仿

translation.en: Yeah, he took four buses to get a hot cup of soup.
translation.zh: 是啊 他坐了四趟车 只为喝碗热汤

translation.en: Barefoot.
translation.zh: 光着脚

translation.en: Now, in here we are about to assemble millions of dollars,
translation.zh: 而我们在这里 准备筹集数百万美元

translation.en: and honestly, for what?
translation.zh: 说实话 图什么呢？

translation.en: When my dad offered you the CFO position,
translation.zh: 当我爸爸给你首席财务官的职位时

translation.en: why'd you take the job?
translation.zh: 你为什么接受这份工作？

translation.en: My family. The kids.
translation.zh: 我的家人 我的孩子

translation.en: Yet here you are, away from your family,
translation.zh: 但你在这里 远离家人 距离圣诞节只有几天了

translation.en: just days before Christmas,
translation.zh: 远离家人 距离圣诞节只有几天了

translation.en: and you're focused on work.
translation.zh: 你还在工作

translation.en: The Bernet Farms taught me that simple can be better.
translation.zh: 贝奈特农场教会我 简单可以更好

translation.en: That having less can sometimes mean having more.
translation.zh: 追求更少 有时意味着拥有更多

translation.en: I'm stepping in as acting CEO
translation.zh: 我将接任范阿斯顿集团

translation.en: of Van Aston Enterprises effective immediately.
translation.zh: 执行总裁一职 立即生效

translation.en: There will be a shift in the company,
translation.zh: 公司将会进行转变

translation.en: from caring solely about the shareholders to also caring about the community.
translation.zh: 从只关心股东 变成也关心社区

translation.en: And you might not like to hear this, but 10% of our annual profits
translation.zh: 你可能不喜欢我的决定 但我们年利润的10%

translation.en: will go to multiple charities around the city.
translation.zh: 将捐给市内的各种慈善机构

translation.en: What profits?
translation.zh: 什么利润？

translation.en: I consider all of you family. I do.
translation.zh: 我把你们都当成家人

translation.en: And I hope this doesn't change our working relationship.
translation.zh: 我希望这不会改变我们的工作关系

translation.en: But if it does…
translation.zh: 但如果有影响…

translation.en: maybe that's okay.
translation.zh: 也许也没关系

translation.en: Oh, and if you're hungry, I hear the soup kitchen next door
translation.zh: 如果你饿了 我听说隔壁的施舍处

translation.en: has quite the spread.
translation.zh: 正在提供节日大餐呢

translation.en: -[sighs heavily] -[Callie] I could eat.
translation.zh: 我可以去吃

translation.en: [Callie] That was quite the speech back there.
translation.zh: 刚才的演讲真是太精彩了

translation.en: I meant every word.
translation.zh: 我都是认真的

translation.en: And I know an apology can't change the fact that I kept something from you for so long.
translation.zh: 我知道 道歉改变不了 我对你一直有所隐瞒的事实

translation.en: I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我原谅你了

translation.en: That's it? [Callie exhales] That's it.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的

translation.en: That speech back there?
translation.zh: 刚才的演讲

translation.en: That is the Joseph I've known for the last year,
translation.zh: 那才是我去年认识的约瑟夫

translation.en: and that is the Joseph that I would like to marry.
translation.zh: 那也是我想嫁给的约瑟夫

translation.en: -You still wanna marry me? -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 你还想嫁给我吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I… I'll do anything.
translation.zh: 因为我愿意放弃一切的

translation.en: I will. I… I don't need the city. I know that now. I just--
translation.zh: 我会的 我不需要城市 我现在知道了 我…

translation.en: I'm not gonna make you give up your life here.
translation.zh: 我不会让你放弃这里的生活

translation.en: We'll figure something out.
translation.zh: 我们会想到办法的

translation.en: And besides, you've got a lot of work to do.
translation.zh: 而且我们有好多事要做

translation.en: Multiple charities?
translation.zh: 各种慈善机构？

translation.en: You can't do that all from Petaluma, can you?
translation.zh: 你不能在佩塔卢马做这些事吧？

translation.en: -And about the wedding-- -Yeah, about that. We lost the venue.
translation.zh: -关于婚礼… -是的 关于婚礼 我们的场地泡汤了

translation.en: I have another idea.
translation.zh: 我有另外一个主意

translation.en: Uh, Victoria, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: 维多利亚 我能跟你聊聊吗？

translation.en: [Joseph] You know I think fondly of our years together.
translation.zh: 你知道我很怀念我们在一起的日子

translation.en: You are hardworking and ambitious.
translation.zh: 你很努力 很有野心

translation.en: You're exactly the kind of person that people expected
translation.zh: 你正是人们期望中的

translation.en: Joseph Van Aston to marry.
translation.zh: 约瑟夫范阿斯顿夫人

translation.en: I know it's… it's long overdue, but…
translation.zh: 我知道早就该这样做了 但是…

translation.en: I'm really sorry,
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: and I hope you'll forgive me.
translation.zh: 我希望你能原谅我

translation.en: What was your excuse again?
translation.zh: 这次的理由是什么呢？

translation.en: "Marriage just isn't for me, V."
translation.zh: “结婚不适合我 维多利亚”

translation.en: [inhales] I always thought I'd be the one who tamed the lion.
translation.zh: 我一直以为 我会是驯服狮子的人

translation.en: Watching Callie parade around with that rock on her finger was just--
translation.zh: 看着凯莉手指上 戴着那块钻石走来走去 真是…

translation.en: Oh, the rock that you said once was on your finger?
translation.zh: 就是你说你曾戴过的钻石吗？

translation.en: -Joseph-- -[Joseph] I'm not trying to fight.
translation.zh: -约瑟夫 -我不是想吵架 只是…

translation.en: If I remember right, you kept the ring that I gave you.
translation.zh: 如果我没记错 我给你的戒指 还在你手里呢

translation.en: Turned it into a beautiful pair of half diamond studs.
translation.zh: 我把它改成一对漂亮的钻石耳钉了

translation.en: Let's see if they fit!
translation.zh: 看看尺寸是否合适吧！

translation.en: Why now? After so many years?
translation.zh: 为什么是现在呢？ 已经过去那么多年了？

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm starting to realize that holding things in,
translation.zh: 我想我开始意识到 把事情憋在心里

translation.en: it can really hurt somebody.
translation.zh: 是会伤害到别人的

translation.en: Yeah? Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 太好了 圣诞快乐！

translation.en: Maybe you have changed, Joseph.
translation.zh: 也许你真是变了 约瑟夫

translation.en: I'm trying to prove it.
translation.zh: 我在努力证明

translation.en: To you, to…
translation.zh: 向你 向…

translation.en: to everyone. [exhales]
translation.zh: 向大家

translation.en: -Joseph, that photo was-- -[Joseph] I know.
translation.zh: -约瑟夫 那张照片… -我知道

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: All right. Have fun tonight. Okay?
translation.zh: 好了 今晚玩得开心点 好吗？

translation.en: Hey, Joseph hasn't introduced us yet.
translation.zh: 嘿 约瑟夫还没介绍我们认识

translation.en: I'm Owen.
translation.zh: 我叫欧文

translation.en: ♪ I love you in a forever kind of way ♪
translation.zh: （心之所在即为家）

translation.en: Joseph! Joseph, um…
translation.zh: 约瑟夫！

translation.en: -What? -I… I just got… [exhales]
translation.zh: 我刚才…

translation.en: -What? What? -It's time! It's time!
translation.zh: -什么？ -是时候了！

translation.en: -For what? -The baby's coming! Hurry!
translation.zh: -什么是时候了？ -宝宝要生了！快点！

translation.en: -I'll get my truck! -No time for that!
translation.zh: -我去开卡车！ -来不及了！

translation.en: -I'm gonna be a dad. -Yes, you are gonna be a dad! [laughs]
translation.zh: -我要当爸爸了 -是的 你要当爸爸了

translation.en: [Callie] Joseph!
translation.zh: 约瑟夫！
